fields.name: Acrobatic
fields.description: You are skilled at leaping, jumping, and flying.

fields.name: Acrobatic Steps
fields.description: You can easily move over and through obstacles.

fields.name: Agile Maneuvers
fields.description: You've learned to use your quickness in place of brute force when performing combat maneuvers.

fields.name: Alertness
fields.description: You often notice things that others might miss.

fields.name: Alignment Channel
fields.description: Choose chaos, evil, good, or law. You can channel divine energy to affect outsiders that possess this subtype.

fields.name: Animal Affinity
fields.description: You are skilled at working with animals and mounts.

fields.name: Arcane Armor Mastery
fields.description: You have mastered the ability to cast spells while wearing armor.
fields.prerequisites: Arcane Armor Training, Medium Armor Proficiency, caster level 7th.

fields.name: Arcane Armor Training
fields.description: You have learned how to cast spells while wearing armor.

fields.name: Arcane Strike
fields.description: You draw upon your arcane power to enhance your weapons with magical energy.

fields.name: Heavy Armor Proficiency
fields.description: You are skilled at wearing heavy armor.
fields.prerequisites: Light Armor Proficiency, Medium Armor Proficiency.

fields.name: Light Armor Proficiency
fields.description: You are skilled at wearing light armor.

fields.name: Medium Armor Proficiency
fields.description: You are skilled at wearing medium armor.

fields.name: Athletic
fields.description: You possess inherent physical prowess.

fields.name: Augment Summoning
fields.description: Your summoned creatures are more powerful and robust.

fields.name: Bleeding Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause opponents to bleed profusely.

fields.name: Blind-Fight
fields.description: You are skilled at attacking opponents that you cannot clearly perceive.

fields.name: Blinding Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits blind your opponents.

fields.name: Brew Potion
fields.description: You can create magic potions.

fields.name: Catch Off-Guard
fields.description: Foes are surprised by your skilled use of unorthodox and improvised weapons.

fields.name: Channel Smite
fields.description: You can channel your divine energy through a melee weapon you wield.

fields.name: Cleave
fields.description: You can strike two adjacent foes with a single swing.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Combat Casting
fields.description: You are adept at spellcasting when threatened or distracted.

fields.name: Combat Expertise
fields.description: You can increase your defense at the expense of your accuracy.

fields.name: Combat Reflexes
fields.description: You can make additional attacks of opportunity.

fields.name: Command Undead
fields.description: Using foul powers of necromancy, you can command undead creatures, making them into your servants.

fields.name: Craft Magic Arms and Armor
fields.description: You can create magic armor, shields, and weapons.

fields.name: Craft Rod
fields.description: You can create magic rods.

fields.name: Craft Wand
fields.description: You can create magic wands.

fields.name: Craft Staff
fields.description: You can create magic staves.

fields.name: Craft Wondrous Item
fields.description: You can create wondrous items, a type of magic item.

fields.name: Critical Focus
fields.description: You are trained in the art of causing pain.

fields.name: Critical Mastery
fields.description: Your critical hits cause two additional effects.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, any two critical feats, 14th-level fighter.

fields.name: Dazzling Display
fields.description: Your skill with your favored weapon can frighten enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus, proficiency with the selected weapon.

fields.name: Deadly Aim
fields.description: You can make exceptionally deadly ranged attacks by pinpointing a foe's weak spot, at the expense of making the attack less likely to succeed.

fields.name: Deadly Stroke
fields.description: With a well-placed strike, you can bring a swift and painful end to most foes.
fields.prerequisites: Dazzling Display, Greater Weapon Focus, Shatter Defenses, Weapon Focus, proficiency with the selected weapon, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Deafening Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause enemies to lose their hearing.

fields.name: Deceitful
fields.description: You are skilled at deceiving others, both with the spoken word and with physical disguises.

fields.name: Defensive Combat Training
fields.description: You excel at defending yourself from all manner of combat maneuvers.

fields.name: Deflect Arrows
fields.description: You can knock arrows and other projectiles off course, preventing them from hitting you.

fields.name: Deft Hands
fields.description: You have exceptional manual dexterity.

fields.name: Diehard
fields.description: You are especially hard to kill. Not only do your wounds automatically stabilize when grievously injured, but you can remain conscious and continue to act even at death's door.

fields.name: Disruptive
fields.description: Your training makes it difficult for enemy spellcasters to safely cast spells near you.

fields.name: Dodge
fields.description: Your training and ref lexes allow you to react swiftly to avoid an opponents' attacks.

fields.name: Double Slice
fields.description: Your off-hand weapon while dual-wielding strikes with greater power.

fields.name: Elemental Channel
fields.description: Choose one elemental subtype, such as air, earth, fire, or water. You can channel your divine energy to harm or heal outsiders that possess your chosen elemental subtype.

fields.name: Empower Spell
fields.description: You can increase the power of your spells, causing them to deal more damage.

fields.name: Endurance
fields.description: Harsh conditions or long exertions do not easily tire you.

fields.name: Enlarge Spell
fields.description: You can increase the range of your spells.

fields.name: Eschew Materials
fields.description: You can cast many spells without needing to utilize minor material components.

fields.name: Exhausting Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause opponents to become exhausted.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, Tiring Critical, base attack bonus +15.

fields.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: Choose one type of exotic weapon, such as the spiked chain or whip. You understand how to use that type of exotic weapon in combat, and can utilize any special tricks or qualities that exotic weapon might allow.

fields.name: Extend Spell
fields.description: You can make your spells last twice as long.

fields.name: Extra Channel
fields.description: You can channel divine energy more often.

fields.name: Extra Ki
fields.description: You can use your ki pool more times per day than most.

fields.name: Extra Lay On Hands
fields.description: You can use your lay on hands ability more often.

fields.name: Extra Mercy
fields.description: Your lay on hands ability adds an additional mercy.
fields.prerequisites: Lay on hands class feature, mercy class feature.

fields.name: Extra Performance
fields.description: You can use your bardic performance ability more often than normal.

fields.name: Extra Rage
fields.description: You can use your rage ability more than normal.

fields.name: Far Shot
fields.description: You are more accurate at longer ranges.

fields.name: Fleet
fields.description: You are faster than most.

fields.name: Forge Ring
fields.description: You can create magic rings.

fields.name: Gorgon's Fist
fields.description: With one well-placed blow, you leave your target reeling.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Scorpion Style, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Great Cleave
fields.description: You can strike many adjacent foes with a single blow.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +4.

fields.name: Great Fortitude
fields.description: You are resistant to poisons, diseases, and other maladies.

fields.name: Greater Bull Rush
fields.description: Your bull rush attacks throw enemies off balance.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6, Str 13.

fields.name: Greater Disarm
fields.description: You can knock weapons far from an enemy's grasp.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm, base attack bonus +6, Int 13.

fields.name: Greater Feint
fields.description: You are skilled at making foes overreact to your attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, base attack bonus +6, Int 13.

fields.name: Greater Grapple
fields.description: Maintaining a grapple is second nature to you.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6, Dex 13.

fields.name: Greater Overrun
fields.description: Enemies must dive to avoid your dangerous move.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Overrun, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6, Str 13.

fields.name: Greater Penetrating Strike
fields.description: Your attacks penetrate the defenses of most foes.

fields.name: Greater Shield Focus
fields.description: You are skilled at def lecting blows with your shield.

fields.name: Greater Spell Focus
fields.description: Choose a school of magic to which you have already applied the Spell Focus feat. Any spells you cast of this school are very hard to resist.

fields.name: Greater Spell Penetration
fields.description: Your spells break through spell resistance much more easily than most.

fields.name: Greater Sunder
fields.description: Your devastating strikes cleave through weapons and armor and into their wielders, damaging both item and wielder alike in a single terrific strike.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6, Str 13.

fields.name: Greater Trip
fields.description: You can make free attacks on foes that you knock down.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, base attack bonus +6, Int 13.

fields.name: Greater Two-Weapon Fighting
fields.description: You are incredibly skilled at fighting with two weapons at the same time.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 19, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Greater Vital Strike
fields.description: You can make a single attack that deals incredible damage.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Vital Strike, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +16.

fields.name: Greater Weapon Focus
fields.description: Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you have already selected Weapon Focus. You are a master at your chosen weapon.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected weapon, Weapon Focus with selected weapon, 8th-level fighter.

fields.name: Greater Weapon Specialization
fields.description: Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you possess the Weapon Specialization feat. Your attacks with the chosen weapon are more devastating than normal.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected weapon, Greater Weapon Focus with selected weapon, Weapon Focus with selected weapon, Weapon Specialization with selected weapon, 12th-level fighter.

fields.name: Heighten Spell
fields.description: You can cast spells as if they were a higher level.

fields.name: Improved Bull Rush
fields.description: You are skilled at pushing your foes around.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Improved Channel
fields.description: Your channeled energy is harder to resist.

fields.name: Improved Counterspell
fields.description: You are skilled at countering the spells of others using similar spells.

fields.name: Improved Critical
fields.description: Attacks made with your chosen weapon are quite deadly.
fields.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Improved Disarm
fields.description: You are skilled at knocking weapons from a foe's grasp.

fields.name: Improved Familiar
fields.description: This feat allows you to acquire a powerful familiar, but only when you could normally acquire a new familiar.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to acquire a new familiar, compatible alignment, sufficiently high level (see below).

fields.name: Improved Feint
fields.description: You are skilled at fooling your opponents in combat.

fields.name: Improved Grapple
fields.description: You are skilled at grappling opponents.

fields.name: Improved Great Fortitude
fields.description: You can draw upon an inner reserve to resist diseases, poisons, and other grievous harm.

fields.name: Improved Initiative
fields.description: Your quick ref lexes allow you to react rapidly to danger.

fields.name: Improved Iron Will
fields.description: Your clarity of thought allows you to resist mental attacks.

fields.name: Improved Lightning Reflexes
fields.description: You have a knack for avoiding danger all around you.

fields.name: Improved Overrun
fields.description: You are skilled at running down your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Improved Precise Shot
fields.description: Your ranged attacks ignore anything but total concealment and cover.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 19, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Improved Shield Bash
fields.description: You can protect yourself with your shield, even if you use it to attack.

fields.name: Improved Sunder
fields.description: You are skilled at damaging your foes' weapons and armor.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Improved Trip
fields.description: You are skilled at sending your opponents to the ground.

fields.name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting
fields.description: You are skilled at fighting with two weapons.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Improved Unarmed Strike
fields.description: You are skilled at fighting while unarmed.

fields.name: Improved Vital Strike
fields.description: You can make a single attack that deals a large amount of damage.

fields.name: Improvised Weapon Mastery
fields.description: You can turn nearly any object into a deadly weapon, from a razor-sharp chair leg to a sack of flour.
fields.prerequisites: Catch Off-Guard or Throw Anything, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Intimidating Prowess
fields.description: Your physical might is intimidating to others.

fields.name: Iron Will
fields.description: You are more resistant to mental effects.

fields.name: Leadership
fields.description: You attract followers to your cause and a companion to join you on your adventures.

fields.name: Lightning Reflexes
fields.description: You have faster ref lexes than normal.

fields.name: Lightning Stance
fields.description: The speed at which you move makes it nearly impossible for opponents to strike you.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, Dodge, Wind Stance, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Lunge
fields.description: You can strike foes that would normally be out of reach.

fields.name: Magical Aptitude
fields.description: You are skilled at spellcasting and using magic items.

fields.name: Manyshot
fields.description: You can fire multiple arrows at a single target.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Martial Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: Choose a type of martial weapon. You understand how to use that type of martial weapon in combat.

fields.name: Master Craftsman
fields.description: Your superior crafting skills allow you to create simple magic items.
fields.prerequisites: 5 ranks in any Craft or Profession skill.

fields.name: Maximize Spell
fields.description: Your spells have the maximum possible effect.

fields.name: Medusa's Wrath
fields.description: You can take advantage of your opponent's confusion, delivering multiple blows.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Gorgon's Fist, Scorpion Style, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Mobility
fields.description: You can easily move through a dangerous melee.

fields.name: Mounted Archery
fields.description: You are skilled at making ranged attacks while mounted.

fields.name: Mounted Combat
fields.description: You are adept at guiding your mount through combat.

fields.name: Natural Spell
fields.description: You can cast spells even while in a form that cannot normally cast spells.

fields.name: Nimble Moves
fields.description: You can move across a single obstacle with ease.

fields.name: Penetrating Strike
fields.description: Your attacks are capable of penetrating the defenses of some creatures.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus, 12th-level fighter, proficiency with weapon.

fields.name: Persuasive
fields.description: You are skilled at swaying attitudes and intimidating others into your way of thinking.

fields.name: Pinpoint Targeting
fields.description: You can target the weak points in your opponent's armor.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 19, Improved Precise Shot, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +16.

fields.name: Point-Blank Shot
fields.description: You are especially accurate when making ranged attacks against close targets.

fields.name: Power Attack
fields.description: You can make exceptionally deadly melee attacks by sacrificing accuracy for strength.

fields.name: Precise Shot
fields.description: You are adept at firing ranged attacks into melee.

fields.name: Quick Draw
fields.description: You can draw weapons faster than most.

fields.name: Quicken Spell
fields.description: You can cast spells in a fraction of the normal time.

fields.name: Rapid Shot
fields.description: You can make an additional ranged attack.

fields.name: Ride-By Attack
fields.description: While mounted and charging, you can move, strike at a foe, and then continue moving.

fields.name: Run
fields.description: You are swift of foot.

fields.name: Scorpion Style
fields.description: You can perform an unarmed strike that greatly hampers your target's movement.

fields.name: Scribe Scroll
fields.description: You can create magic scrolls.

fields.name: Selective Channeling
fields.description: You can choose whom to affect when you channel energy.

fields.name: Self-Sufficient
fields.description: You know how to get along in the wild and how to effectively treat wounds.

fields.name: Shatter Defenses
fields.description: Your skill with your chosen weapon leaves opponents unable to defend themselves if you strike them when their defenses are already compromised.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus, Dazzling Display, base attack bonus +6, proficiency with weapon.

fields.name: Shield Focus
fields.description: You are skilled at def lecting blows with your shield.

fields.name: Shield Proficiency
fields.description: You are trained in how to properly use a shield.

fields.name: Shield Slam
fields.description: In the right position, your shield can be used to send opponents flying.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Shield Bash, Shield Proficiency, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Shot on the Run
fields.description: You can move, fire a ranged weapon, and move again before your foes can react.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point-Blank Shot, base attack bonus +4.

fields.name: Sickening Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause opponents to become sickened.

fields.name: Silent Spell
fields.description: You can cast your spells without making any sound.

fields.name: Simple Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: You are trained in the use of basic weapons.

fields.name: Skill Focus
fields.description: Choose a skill. You are particularly adept at that skill.

fields.name: Snatch Arrows
fields.description: Instead of knocking an arrow or ranged attack aside, you can catch it in mid-flight.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Deflect Arrows, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Spell Focus
fields.description: Choose a school of magic. Any spells you cast of that school are more difficult to resist.

fields.name: Spell Mastery
fields.description: You have mastered a small handful of spells, and can prepare these spells without referencing your spellbooks at all.

fields.name: Spell Penetration
fields.description: Your spells break through spell resistance more easily than most.

fields.name: Spellbreaker
fields.description: You can strike at enemy spellcasters who fail to cast defensively when you threaten them.

fields.name: Spirited Charge
fields.description: Your mounted charge attacks deal a tremendous amount of damage.
fields.prerequisites: Ride 1 rank, Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack.

fields.name: Spring Attack
fields.description: You can deftly move up to a foe, strike, and withdraw before he can react.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, base attack bonus +4.

fields.name: Staggering Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause opponents to slow down.

fields.name: Stand Still
fields.description: You can stop foes that try to move past you.

fields.name: Stealthy
fields.description: You are good at avoiding unwanted attention and slipping out of bonds.

fields.name: Step Up
fields.description: You can close the distance when a foe tries to move away.

fields.name: Still Spell
fields.description: You can cast spells without moving.

fields.name: Strike Back
fields.description: You can strike at foes that attack you using their superior reach, by targeting their limbs or weapons as they come at you.

fields.name: Stunning Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause opponents to become stunned.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, Staggering Critical, base attack bonus +17.

fields.name: Stunning Fist
fields.description: You know just where to strike to temporarily stun a foe.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Throw Anything
fields.description: You are used to throwing things you have on hand.

fields.name: Tiring Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits cause opponents to become fatigued.

fields.name: Toughness
fields.description: You have enhanced physical stamina.

fields.name: Tower Shield Proficiency
fields.description: You are trained in how to properly use a tower shield.

fields.name: Trample
fields.description: While mounted, you can ride down opponents and trample them under your mount.

fields.name: Turn Undead
fields.description: Calling upon higher powers, you cause undead to flee from the might of your unleashed divine energy.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Defense
fields.description: You are skilled at defending yourself while dual-wielding.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
fields.description: You can fight with a weapon wielded in each of your hands. You can make one extra attack each round with the secondary weapon.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Rend
fields.description: Striking with both of your weapons simultaneously, you can use them to deliver devastating wounds.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, Double Slice, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Unseat
fields.description: You are skilled at unseating your mounted opponents.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Ride 1 rank, Mounted Combat, Power Attack, Improved Bull Rush, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Vital Strike
fields.description: You make a single attack that deals significantly more damage than normal.

fields.name: Weapon Finesse
fields.description: You are trained in using your agility in melee combat, as opposed to brute strength.

fields.name: Weapon Focus
fields.description: Choose one type of weapon. You can also choose unarmed strike or grapple (or ray, if you are a spellcaster) as your weapon for the purposes of this feat.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected weapon, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Weapon Specialization
fields.description: You are skilled at dealing damage with one weapon. Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you have already selected the Weapon Focus feat. You deal extra damage when using this weapon.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected weapon, Weapon Focus with selected weapon, fighter level 4th.

fields.name: Whirlwind Attack
fields.description: You can strike out at every foe within reach.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Dodge, Mobility, Spring Attack, base attack bonus +4.

fields.name: Widen Spell
fields.description: You can cast your spells so that they occupy a larger space.

fields.name: Wind Stance
fields.description: Your erratic movements make it difficult for enemies to pinpoint your location.

fields.name: Additional Traits
fields.description: You have more traits than normal.

fields.name: Ability Focus
fields.description: One of this creature's special attacks is particularly difficult to resist.

fields.name: Awesome Blow
fields.description: This creature can send opponents flying.
fields.prerequisites: Str 25, Power Attack, Improved Bull Rush, size Large or larger.

fields.name: Craft Construct
fields.description: You can create construct creatures like golems.
fields.prerequisites: Caster level 5th, Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Craft Wondrous Item.

fields.name: Empower Spell-Like Ability
fields.description: One of this creature's spell-like abilities is particularly potent and powerful.
fields.prerequisites: Spell-like ability at caster level 6th or higher.

fields.name: Flyby Attack
fields.description: This creature can make an attack before and after it moves while flying.

fields.name: Hover
fields.description: This creature can hover in place with ease and can kick up clouds of dust and debris.

fields.name: Improved Natural Armor
fields.description: This creature's hide is tougher than most.

fields.name: Improved Natural Attack
fields.description: Attacks made by one of this creature's natural attacks leave vicious wounds.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.description: This creature is particularly skilled at making attacks with its natural weapons.

fields.name: Quicken Spell-Like Ability
fields.description: This creature can use one of its spell-like abilities with next to no effort.
fields.prerequisites: Spell-like ability at CL 10th or higher.

fields.name: Snatch
fields.description: This creature can grab other creatures with ease.

fields.name: Wingover
fields.description: This creature can make turns with ease while flying.

fields.name: Allied Spellcaster
fields.description: With the aid of an ally, you are skilled at piercing the protections of other creatures with your spells.

fields.name: Arcane Blast
fields.description: You can convert any spell into an attack.

fields.name: Arcane Shield
fields.description: You can convert any spell into a defense.

fields.name: Arcane Talent
fields.description: Magic is in your blood, and at your fingertips.

fields.name: Aspect of the Beast
fields.description: Whether by magic or a curse of your blood, some part of you is more beast than man.
fields.prerequisites: wild shape class feature, see Special.

fields.name: Bashing Finish
fields.description: You follow a powerful blow from your weapon with an opportunistic bash from your shield.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Shield Bash, Shield Master, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Bloody Assault
fields.description: Sacrificing accuracy, you can inflict bloody wounds that are slow to heal.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Bodyguard
fields.description: Your swift strikes ward off enemies attacking nearby allies.

fields.name: Bouncing Spell
fields.description: You can direct a failed spell against a different target.

fields.name: Breadth of Experience
fields.description: Although still young for your kind, you have a lifetime of knowledge and training.
fields.prerequisites: Dwarf, elf, or gnome; 100+ years old.

fields.name: Bull Rush Strike
fields.description: Your critical hits can push back your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Charge Through
fields.description: You can overrun enemies when charging.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Overrun, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Childlike
fields.description: Your resemblance to a human child tends to make others trust you, perhaps more than they should.

fields.name: Cloud Step
fields.description: Your tread is of unearthly lightness.

fields.name: Cockatrice Strike
fields.description: With a single strike, you transmute flesh to stone.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Gorgon's Fist, Medusa's Wrath, base attack bonus +14.

fields.name: Combat Patrol
fields.description: You range across the battlefield, dealing with threats wherever they arise.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Reflexes, Mobility, base attack bonus +5.

fields.name: Cooperative Crafting
fields.description: Your assistance makes item crafting far more efficient.
fields.prerequisites: 1 rank in any Craft skill, any item creation feat.

fields.name: Coordinated Defense
fields.description: You are adept at working with allies to avoid being tripped, grappled, and subjected to other maneuvers.

fields.name: Coordinated Maneuvers
fields.description: You are skilled at working with your allies to perform dangerous combat maneuvers.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.description: Living in large, exotic cities has put you in touch with many diverse civilizations, cultures, and races.

fields.name: Covering Defense
fields.description: You are skilled at protecting yourself and your allies with your shield.

fields.name: Crippling Critical
fields.description: You are able to maim a target and hinder its movement.

fields.name: Crossbow Mastery
fields.description: You can load crossbows with blinding speed and even fire them in melee with little fear of reprisal.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Reload, Rapid Shot.

fields.name: Dastardly Finish
fields.description: You can take advantage of an enemy's debilitated state to attempt a coup de grace.

fields.name: Dazing Assault
fields.description: You can daze foes with wild attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Dazing Spell
fields.description: You can daze creatures with the power of your spells.

fields.name: Deep Drinker
fields.description: You draw greater amounts of ki from your libations.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, monk level 11, drunken ki class feature.

fields.name: Deepsight
fields.description: Your senses are especially keen in the utter darkness.

fields.name: Disarming Strike
fields.description: Your critical hits can disarm your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Disrupting Shot
fields.description: With a well-placed shot, you make it harder for a nearby opponent to cast spells.

fields.name: Disruptive Spell
fields.description: Your magical energies cling to enemies, interfering with their spellcasting.

fields.name: Diviner's Delving
fields.description: Your keen magical intuition makes reading signs, portents, and mystical clues quick and easy.

fields.name: Dreadful Carnage
fields.description: Slaying an enemy demoralizes your other nearby foes.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Power Attack, Furious Focus, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Duck and Cover
fields.description: Your allies assist you in avoiding certain attacks.

fields.name: Eagle Eyes
fields.description: Your vision is especially keen.

fields.name: Eclectic
fields.description: You have a talent for picking up different vocations.

fields.name: Ectoplasmic Spell
fields.description: Your spells breach the gulf between dimensions, sending ghostly emanations into the ether.

fields.name: Eldritch Claws
fields.description: Who needs magic weapons? Eldritch tricks are no match for your bestial ferocity.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, natural weapons, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Elemental Fist
fields.description: You empower your strike with elemental energy
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Elemental Focus
fields.description: Your spells of a certain element are more difficult to resist.

fields.name: Elemental Spell
fields.description: You can manipulate the elemental nature of your spells.

fields.name: Elven Accuracy
fields.description: Your sharp eyesight makes difficult shots easier.

fields.name: Enforcer
fields.description: You are skilled at causing fear in those you brutalize.

fields.name: Expanded Arcana
fields.description: Your research has revealed new spells.

fields.name: Extra Bombs
fields.description: You can throw more bombs per day.

fields.name: Extra Discovery
fields.description: You have made a new alchemical discovery.

fields.name: Extra Hex
fields.description: You have learned the secrets of a new hex.

fields.name: Extra Rage Power
fields.description: You have unlocked a new ability to use while raging.

fields.name: Extra Revelation
fields.description: You have discovered a new aspect of your mystery.

fields.name: Extra Rogue Talent
fields.description: Through constant practice, you have learned how to perform a special trick.

fields.name: Fast Drinker
fields.description: You swiftly guzzle spirits to draw forth ki.

fields.name: Fast Healer
fields.description: You benefit greatly from your healing, be it from spells or natural healing.

fields.name: Favored Defense
fields.description: Your cunning is your shield against your quarry's attacks.

fields.name: Fight On
fields.description: You can keep fighting even after you should be dead.

fields.name: Focused Shot
fields.description: Your anatomical insight adds deadliness to your shots.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Point Blank Shot, Precise Shot.

fields.name: Focused Spell
fields.description: When you cast a spell that affects more than one creature, one opponent finds it more difficult to resist.

fields.name: Following Step
fields.description: You can repeatedly close the distance when foes try to move away, without impeding your normal movement.

fields.name: Furious Focus
fields.description: Even in the midst of fierce and furious blows, you can find focus in the carnage and your seemingly wild blows strike home.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Gang Up
fields.description: You are adept at using greater numbers against foes.

fields.name: Gnome Trickster
fields.description: Your arcane talents go beyond the illusory.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome, gnome magic racial trait.

fields.name: Go Unnoticed
fields.description: Your small size lets you quickly duck out of sight.

fields.name: Greater Blind-Fight
fields.description: Your enemies cannot hide from you.

fields.name: Greater Dirty Trick
fields.description: When you pull a dirty trick, your foe is truly hindered.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Greater Drag
fields.description: Foes that you drag are thrown out of balance.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Greater Elemental Focus
fields.description: Choose an energy type to which you have already applied the Elemental Focus feat. Any spells you cast of this energy type are very hard to resist.

fields.name: Greater Reposition
fields.description: When you reposition foes, they are left vulnerable to the attacks of your allies.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Greater Shield Specialization
fields.description: Your masterful shieldwork provides even greater protection to your vital areas.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected shield, Greater Shield Focus, Shield Focus, Shield Specialization with selected shield, fighter level 12th.

fields.name: Greater Steal
fields.description: You have a knack for snatching items from your opponents in combat.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Steal, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Groundling
fields.description: You can speak with burrowing animals.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome, gnome magic racial trait.

fields.name: Heroic Defiance
fields.description: You struggle on when others would fall.

fields.name: Heroic Recovery
fields.description: You can throw off the effects of crippling conditions.

fields.name: Improved Blind-Fight
fields.description: Your keen senses guide your hand against hidden foes.

fields.name: Improved Dirty Trick
fields.description: You are skilled at pulling dirty tricks on your foes.

fields.name: Improved Drag
fields.description: You are skilled at dragging foes around the battlefield.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Improved Ki Throw
fields.description: Your enemies are living weapons in your hands.

fields.name: Improved Reposition
fields.description: You have learned how to force your enemies to move around the battlefield.

fields.name: Improved Second Chance
fields.description: You can turn a missed strike into a second chance without sacrificing later attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Second Chance, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Improved Share Spells
fields.description: You can share spells with those you have a magical connection with.
fields.prerequisites: Spellcraft 10 ranks, ability to acquire an animal companion, eidolon, familiar, or special mount.

fields.name: Improved Sidestep
fields.description: You are adept at sidestepping your opponent's melee attacks without compromising your mobility.

fields.name: Improved Steal
fields.description: You have a knack for snatching items from your opponents.

fields.name: Improved Stonecunning
fields.description: Your sense for stonework is uncanny.

fields.name: Intensified Spell
fields.description: Your spells can go beyond several normal limitations.

fields.name: In Harm's Way
fields.description: You put yourself in danger's path to save your allies.

fields.name: Ironguts
fields.description: You have an especially strong stomach.

fields.name: Ironhide
fields.description: Your skin is thicker and more resilient than that of most of your people.

fields.name: Keen Scent
fields.description: Your nose is as sensitive as that of a wild predator.

fields.name: Ki Throw
fields.description: Your physical control and mastery of momentum allows you to throw enemies.

fields.name: Leaf Singer
fields.description: Your songs recount the ways and mysteries of your people.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, bardic performance class feature, elf or half-elf.

fields.name: Light Step
fields.description: You pick your way nimbly through even the most dangerous and uneven terrain.

fields.name: Lingering Performance
fields.description: The effects of your bardic performance carry on, even after you have stopped performing.

fields.name: Lingering Spell
fields.description: You spell clings to existence, slowly fading from the world.

fields.name: Lookout
fields.description: Your allies help you avoid being surprised.

fields.name: Low Profile
fields.description: Yours small stature helps you avoid ranged attacks.

fields.name: Lucky Halfling
fields.description: You bring luck to those with whom you travel.

fields.name: Major Spell Expertise
fields.description: You can cast a single low-level spell as a spell-like ability.
fields.prerequisites: Minor Spell Expertise, ability to cast 9th-level spells.

fields.name: Master Alchemist
fields.description: Your mastery of alchemy is nearly supernatural.

fields.name: Merciful Spell
fields.description: Your damaging spells subdue rather than kill.

fields.name: Minor Spell Expertise
fields.description: You are able to cast a 1st-level spell as a spell-like ability.

fields.name: Missile Shield
fields.description: You are skilled at def lecting ranged attacks with your shield.

fields.name: Mounted Shield
fields.description: Your defensive tactics defend both you and your mount.

fields.name: Mounted Skirmisher
fields.description: You are adept at attacking from upon a swift moving steed.
fields.prerequisites: Ride rank 14, Mounted Combat, Trick Riding.

fields.name: Outflank
fields.description: You look for every edge when flanking an enemy.

fields.name: Paired Opportunists
fields.description: You know how to make an enemy pay for lax defenses.

fields.name: Parry Spell
fields.description: You can throw an enemy spell back at its caster.

fields.name: Parting Shot
fields.description: You are an expert skirmisher, able to rain missiles upon your enemies whether advancing or retreating.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point Blank Shot, Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Pass For Human
fields.description: You're easily mistaken for a human rather than a member of your own race.

fields.name: Perfect Strike
fields.description: When wielding a monk weapon, your attacks can be extremely precise.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Persistent Spell
fields.description: You can modify a spell to become more tenacious when its targets resist its effect.

fields.name: Point Blank Master
fields.description: You are adept at firing ranged weapons in close quarters.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Specialization with selected ranged weapon.

fields.name: Practiced Tactician
fields.description: With only a few quick gestures and commands, you can direct others in combat.

fields.name: Precise Strike
fields.description: You are skilled at striking where it counts, as long as an ally distracts your foe.

fields.name: Preferred Spell
fields.description: You find it very easy to cast one particular spell.

fields.name: Punishing Kick
fields.description: Your kicks are so powerful you use them to push or knock back your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Pushing Assault
fields.description: A strike made with a two-handed weapon can push a similar sized opponent backward.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Racial Heritage
fields.description: The blood of a non-human ancestor flows in your veins.

fields.name: Raging Vitality
fields.description: While raging, you are full of vigor and health.

fields.name: Ray Shield
fields.description: You can even deflect rays with your shield.

fields.name: Razortusk
fields.description: Your powerful jaws and steely teeth are deadly enough to give you a bite attack.

fields.name: Reach Spell
fields.description: Your spells go farther than normal.

fields.name: Rending Claws
fields.description: Your claw attacks do greater harm to your enemy.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, two claw natural weapon attacks, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Repositioning Strike
fields.description: Your critical hits can move your foes where you wish.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Saving Shield
fields.description: You deflect attacks that could mean your ally's death.

fields.name: Second Chance
fields.description: Quick ref lexes turn missed strikes into second chances.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Selective Spell
fields.description: Your allies need not fear friendly fire.

fields.name: Shadow Strike
fields.description: You accurately strike even those you cannot clearly see.

fields.name: Shared Insight
fields.description: You deftly direct others' attentions where you wish.

fields.name: Sharp Senses
fields.description: Your senses are especially sharp, even for your kind.

fields.name: Shield of Swings
fields.description: A wild frenzy of attacks serves to bolster your defenses.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Shield Specialization
fields.description: You have mastered the use of one type of shield.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected shield, Shield Focus, fighter level 4th.

fields.name: Shield Wall
fields.description: You form a unified defense with those around you.

fields.name: Shielded Caster
fields.description: Your allies cover you while you cast complicated spells.

fields.name: Sickening Spell
fields.description: You can sicken creatures with your spells.

fields.name: Sidestep
fields.description: You can reposition yourself after a foe's missed swing.

fields.name: Smash
fields.description: You overcome obstacles by breaking them.

fields.name: Smell Fear
fields.description: You can catch the sour scent of fear on the wind.

fields.name: Sociable
fields.description: You have a way of helping others to get along.

fields.name: Spell Perfection
fields.description: You are unequaled at the casting of one particular spell.
fields.prerequisites: Spellcraft 15 ranks, at least three metamagic feats.

fields.name: Spider Step
fields.description: Your physical mastery grants you an impossible stride.
fields.prerequisites: Acrobatics 6 ranks, Climb 6 ranks, monk level 6th.

fields.name: Stabbing Shot
fields.description: You can clear the way to continue using your bow.

fields.name: Steel Soul
fields.description: You are especially resistant to magic.

fields.name: Step Up and Strike
fields.description: When a foe tries to move away, you can follow and make an attack.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Following Step, Step Up, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Stone-Faced
fields.description: Rocks show more expression than you.

fields.name: Stone Sense
fields.description: You can feel movement in the very earth and stones around you.

fields.name: Stone Singer
fields.description: Your songs are in accordance with the ways and lands of your people.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, bardic performance class feature, dwarf.

fields.name: Stunning Assault
fields.description: You powerful but imprecise attacks can stun your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +16.

fields.name: Summoner's Call
fields.description: Whenever you summon your eidolon, it is more powerful for a brief period of time.

fields.name: Sundering Strike
fields.description: Your critical hits can sunder your foes' weapons.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Swap Places
fields.description: You are skilled at changing places with your ally during a chaotic melee.

fields.name: Swift Aid
fields.description: With a quick but harmless swipe, you can aid an ally's assault.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Taunt
fields.description: You may be small, but your remarks cut others down to size.

fields.name: Team Up
fields.description: When you are ganging up against an enemy, you can aid an ally with a quick feint.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Gang Up, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Teleport Tactician
fields.description: You are highly alert for enemies using teleportation to approach you or flee from you.

fields.name: Tenacious Transmutation
fields.description: Your mastery of the magic of changing makes your transmutations more durable.

fields.name: Thundering Spell
fields.description: You can conjure your spells into existence with blaring thunder or fearful shrieks, deafening creatures damaged by their effects.

fields.name: Touch of Serenity
fields.description: With a single touch you can reduce the threat of even the most savage of foes.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 18, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Trick Riding
fields.description: You are not only skilled at controlling a horse in combat; you can make it look like art.

fields.name: Tripping Strike
fields.description: The force intrinsic to your critical hits can knock your foes down.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Under and Over
fields.description: You can slip under a foe trying to grab you, knocking him off balance.
fields.prerequisites: Agile Maneuvers, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Underfoot
fields.description: You slip under and around your larger foes.
fields.prerequisites: Dodge, Mobility, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Vermin Heart
fields.description: You have a special bond with things that creep, crawl, skitter, and sting.

fields.name: War Singer
fields.description: Your songs draw upon the savage chants and brutal ways of your people, inspiring those around you to new heights of violence and savagery.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, bardic performance class feature, half-orc or orc.

fields.name: Well-Prepared
fields.description: Somehow, you always seem to have the right tools or supplies close at hand.

fields.name: Adder Strike
fields.description: You can quickly apply poison to gloved hands, protected feet, or other protected body parts, delivering the poison with your unarmed strikes.
fields.prerequisites: Poison use class feature, Craft (alchemy) 1 rank, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Adept Champion
fields.description: You can alter your smite ability, channeling the power of your deity into divine inspiration that grants you greater aptitude for performing combat maneuvers.
fields.prerequisites: Smite evil class feature, base attack bonus +5.

fields.name: Amateur Gunslinger
fields.description: Although you are not a gunslinger, you have and can use grit.
fields.prerequisites: You have no levels in a class that has the grit class feature.

fields.name: Arc Slinger
fields.description: You can twirl your sling in a way that maximizes its effectiveness.
fields.prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, proficient with sling or halfling sling staff.

fields.name: Back to Back
fields.description: Your ally's eyes are your own, and yours are his.

fields.name: Betrayer
fields.description: You can charm people into lowering their defenses, allowing you to ambush them more effectively.
fields.prerequisites: Quick Draw, Persuasive, base attack bonus +3.

fields.name: Binding Throw
fields.description: You can strike your enemy and use the blow as an opportunity to grab and hold him.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Ki Throw.

fields.name: Bludgeoner
fields.description: You can knock foes out cold with just about any blunt instrument.

fields.name: Boar Ferocity
fields.description: Your flesh-ripping unarmed strikes terrify your victims.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Boar Style, Intimidate 6 ranks.

fields.name: Boar Shred
fields.description: The wounds you inf lict with your unarmed strikes bleed, giving you renewed vigor.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Boar Ferocity, Boar Style, Intimidate 9 ranks.

fields.name: Boar Style
fields.description: Your sharp teeth and nails rip your foes open.

fields.name: Body Shield
fields.description: With a sly maneuver, you force a grappled opponent into the path of an incoming attack.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Bolstered Resilience
fields.description: You can dramatically increase your damage reduction in exchange for its temporary loss.

fields.name: Bonebreaker
fields.description: When your opponent is unable to adequately defend against them, your precise unarmed strikes break bone and tear tissue.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Jawbreaker, Stunning Fist, Heal 9 ranks.

fields.name: Branded for Retribution
fields.description: You brand an enemy with your bane weapon, making it more vulnerable to your allies' attacks.

fields.name: Break Guard
fields.description: You can use one of your two weapons to occupy your opponent's defenses while attacking with the other.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm, Two-Weapon Fighting.

fields.name: Broken Wing Gambit
fields.description: You feign weakness, making yourself a tempting and distracting target.

fields.name: Cartwheel Dodge
fields.description: You use your knack for avoiding damage to reposition yourself in combat.
fields.prerequisites: Evasion class feature, improved evasion class feature, acrobatics 12 ranks.

fields.name: Cavalry Formation
fields.description: You are skilled at riding in close formation with your mounted allies without impeding your effectiveness on the battlefield.

fields.name: Channeled Revival
fields.description: You can expend a large portion of your channeling power to reverse death itself.

fields.name: Channeling Scourge
fields.description: Your zeal for hunting your faith's enemies empowers your ability to channel divine energy, as long as you channel that energy for harm.
fields.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, inquisitor level 1st.

fields.name: Charging Hurler
fields.description: You know how to use your momentum to enhance your thrown weapon attacks.

fields.name: Chokehold
fields.description: While grappling, you can cut off an opponent's air and blood supply.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Cleaving Finish
fields.description: When you strike down an opponent, you can continue your swing into another target.

fields.name: Close-Quarters Thrower
fields.description: You are agile enough to avoid melee attacks while throwing weapons or bombs.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Weapon Focus with selected thrown weapon.

fields.name: Clustered Shots
fields.description: You take a moment to carefully aim your shots, causing them all to strike nearly the same spot.
fields.prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Combat Medic
fields.description: You know the urgency of treating wounds in the heat of battle, applying first aid to your allies with such speed that you assure no one gets left behind.

fields.name: Combat Style Master
fields.description: You shift between combat styles, combining them to increased effect.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, two or more style feats, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Contingent Channeling
fields.description: You can imbue others with your healing energy so that they can use it at the moment of greatest need.
fields.prerequisites: True healer class feature, Selective Channeling.

fields.name: Coordinated Charge
fields.description: You are an expert at leading your allies into the fray.
fields.prerequisites: You have at least two other teamwork feats, base attack bonus +10.

fields.name: Crane Riposte
fields.description: You use your defensive abilities to make overpowering counterattacks.
fields.prerequisites: Crane Style, Crane Wing, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.

fields.name: Crane Style
fields.description: Your unarmed fighting techniques blend poise with graceful defense.
fields.prerequisites: Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +2 or monk level 1st.

fields.name: Crane Wing
fields.description: You move with the speed and finesse of an avian hunter, your sweeping blocks and graceful motions allowing you to deflect melee attacks with ease.
fields.prerequisites: Crane Style, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Crusader's Fist
fields.description: You pour divine energy into the enemy you strike.
fields.prerequisites: Lay on hands class feature or touch of corruption class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Crusader's Flurry
fields.description: You learned to use your deity's favored weapon as part of your martial arts form.
fields.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, flurry of blows class feature, Weapon Focus with your deity's favored melee weapon.

fields.name: Crushing Blow
fields.description: Your focus allows you to smash your enemy's defenses.

fields.name: Deadly Finish
fields.description: Your attacks don't just fell your opponents-they kill them outright.

fields.name: Death from Above
fields.description: You allow gravity to add extra force to your charges.

fields.name: Death or Glory
fields.description: Even when facing a larger foe, you aren't afraid to take great risks in order to finish the fight.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Deathless Initiate
fields.description: For you, impending death is a call to wrath.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Con 13, orc or half-orc, Diehard, Endurance, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Deathless Master
fields.description: Even if you suffer a grievous wound, you can shrug off the damage and continue your relentless assault.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Con 15, orc or half-orc, Deathless Initiate, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide**, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Deathless Zealot
fields.description: Only the most serious wounds can stop you.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Con 17, orc or half-orc, Deathless Initiate, Deathless Master, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide**, base attack bonus +12.

fields.name: Deceptive Exchange
fields.description: You trick an adversary into grabbing an object you hand them, even in the midst of combat.

fields.name: Defensive Weapon Training
fields.description: You know how to defend yourself against a certain class of weaponry.

fields.name: Deft Shootist Deed
fields.description: You keep an eye out while focusing on your weapon, allowing you to avoid attacks while shooting and reloading firearms.
fields.prerequisites: Grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Dodge, Mobility.

fields.name: Destructive Dispel
fields.description: When you dispel an enemy's magical defenses, those defenses crash down with debilitating effects.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast dispel magic or greater dispel magic, caster level 11th.

fields.name: Devastating Strike
fields.description: Pitting all of your strength and resolve against your enemy, you deliver a strike that is impossible to ignore.

fields.name: Dimensional Agility
fields.description: Teleportation does not faze you.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to use the abundant step class feature or cast dimension door.

fields.name: Dimensional Assault
fields.description: You have been trained to use magical movement as part of your combat tactics.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to use the abundant step class feature or cast dimension door, Dimensional Agility.

fields.name: Dimensional Dervish
fields.description: You teleport with a mere thought, savaging your opponents as you flash in and out of reality.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to use the abundant step class feature or cast dimension door, Dimensional Agility, Dimensional Assault, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Dimensional Maneuvers
fields.description: Your rapid teleportation makes your combat maneuvers more difficult to avoid.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to use the abundant step class feature or cast dimension door, Dimensional Agility, Dimensional Assault, Dimensional Dervish, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Dimensional Savant
fields.description: You flash into and out of reality so quickly it is impossible to tell exactly where you are at any given time.
fields.prerequisites: Dimensional Agility, Dimensional Assault, Dimensional Dervish, ability to use the abundant step class feature or cast dimension door, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Discordant Voice
fields.description: By singing out a precise tone, you cause discordant vibrations to run through allies' weapons.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Perform (oratory or sing) 10 ranks.

fields.name: Disengaging Feint
fields.description: You can feint to disengage from combat.

fields.name: Disengaging Flourish
fields.description: Distracting your opponents gives you the opportunity to make a swift retreat.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Disengaging Feint, Improved Feint.

fields.name: Disengaging Shot
fields.description: You make one last attack before beating a hasty retreat.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Disengaging Feint, Dodge, Improved Feint, Mobility.

fields.name: Disorienting Maneuver
fields.description: Your erratic movements disorient your opponent.

fields.name: Dispel Synergy
fields.description: By tearing away an opponent's magical defenses, you leave your enemy vulnerable, making it difficult for him to resist your spells.

fields.name: Dispelling Critical
fields.description: Your blows attack the physical and arcane forms of your enemies at the same time.
fields.prerequisites: Arcane Strike, base attack bonus +11, ability to cast dispel magic.

fields.name: Dispelling Fist
fields.description: By focusing on your knowledge of magic and spells that negate its powers, you use your bare hands to rip magical defenses from your enemy.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11, ability to cast dispel magic, caster level 7th.

fields.name: Disposable Weapon
fields.description: You ignore the limitations of your equipment, striking harder despite the damage it does to your weapon.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, proficient with weapon.

fields.name: Disruptive Recall
fields.description: You can disrupt an enemy caster's spells to fuel your own arcane power.
fields.prerequisites: Spell recall class feature, Spellcraft 5 ranks.

fields.name: Distance Thrower
fields.description: You are accurate with thrown weapons at longer ranges than normal.

fields.name: Djinni Spin
fields.description: You can surround yourself with the power of the storm, spinning like a hurricane to unleash a violent blast of electrical energy.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 17, Djinni Style, Djinni Spirit, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 11th.

fields.name: Djinni Spirit
fields.description: By calling upon the spirits of storms, you can manipulate lightning to protect yourself and buffet your enemies with peals of thunder.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 15, Djinni Style, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Djinni Style
fields.description: Your hands sheathed in an auras of lightning, you move like the wind.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Wis 15, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Domain Strike
fields.description: You unleash a domain power upon your enemy as part of your unarmed strike.
fields.prerequisites: Domain class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Double Bane
fields.description: You extend your bane effect to two weapons.

fields.name: Drag Down
fields.description: When you are knocked prone, you are skilled at bringing your opponent down with you.

fields.name: Dragon Ferocity
fields.description: You attack with the strength of a dragon, your telling blows striking fear into your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Improved Unarmed Strike, Dragon Style, Stunning Fist, Acrobatics 5 ranks.

fields.name: Dragon Roar
fields.description: The spirit of the dragon wells up inside you and bursts forth in a mighty roar.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Improved Unarmed Strike, Dragon Style, Stunning Fist, Acrobatics 8 ranks.

fields.name: Dragon Style
fields.description: You call upon the spirit of dragonkind, gaining greater resilience, mobility, and fierceness from the blessing of these great beings.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 3 ranks.

fields.name: Dramatic Display
fields.description: Your skill with your weapon is obvious to enemies and onlookers alike.

fields.name: Earth Child Binder
fields.description: Even the greatest giants fear your technique.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Earth Child Style, Earth Child Topple, Greater Trip, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist, Acrobatics 9 ranks.

fields.name: Earth Child Style
fields.description: Your martial training makes you a dangerous and elusive target for giants.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 3 ranks.

fields.name: Earth Child Topple
fields.description: Your mastery of balance and momentum allows you to bring down giants with your bare hands.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Earth Child Style, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 6 ranks.

fields.name: Efreeti Stance
fields.description: Calling upon the burning spirits of incarnate flame, you can manipulate fire to protect yourself and immolate your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 15, Efreeti Style, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Efreeti Style
fields.description: Your mastery of the unpredictable power of flames allows you to unleash scorching strikes that burn your enemies even when you fail to make contact.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Wis 15, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Efreeti Touch
fields.description: Your knowledge of the secrets of the burning wind and blazing sun allows you to collect flames into your hands and unleash them in a gout of elemental fire.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 17, Efreeti Style, Efreeti Stance, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 11th.

fields.name: Elusive Redirection
fields.description: You can redirect an attack back at your assailant or into an adjacent enemy.
fields.prerequisites: Elusive target class feature, Combat Expertise, Improved Unarmed Strike, flowing monk level 12th.

fields.name: Enfilading Fire
fields.description: Your ranged attacks take advantage of the flanking maneuvers of allies.
fields.prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, one other teamwork feat.

fields.name: Escape Route
fields.description: You have trained to watch your allies' backs, covering them as they make tactical withdraws.

fields.name: Expert Driver
fields.description: When driving a chosen type of vehicle, you exhibit incredible control, maneuvering the vehicle with greater ease and stopping with uncanny precision.
fields.prerequisites: Skilled Driver with the selected vehicle type.

fields.name: Extra Bane
fields.description: You can use your bane ability more often than normal.

fields.name: Extra Grit
fields.description: You have more grit than the ordinary gunslinger.
fields.prerequisites: Grit class feature or the Amateur Gunslinger feat.

fields.name: False Opening
fields.description: When you make a ranged attack while threatened, you can fool your opponent into thinking he has an opening.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Close Quarters Thrower or Point-Blank Master, Weapon Focus with selected ranged weapon.

fields.name: Feint Partner
fields.description: A little diversion is all you need to slip through your foe's defenses.

fields.name: Felling Escape
fields.description: Through the use of fluid contortions and manipulations of leverage, you can throw your opponent to the ground after escaping a grapple.

fields.name: Felling Smash
fields.description: You commit all your focus to a devastating blow, trying to crush your opponent to the ground.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Str 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Feral Combat Training
fields.description: You were taught a style of martial arts that relies on the natural weapons from your racial ability or class feature.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Weapon Focus with selected natural weapon.

fields.name: Field Repair
fields.description: You can repair your broken weapon or armor to serviceability even without the benefits of artisan tools.

fields.name: Final Embrace
fields.description: Your coils are particularly deadly, allowing you to constrict opponents of your size or smaller.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; base attack bonus +3.

fields.name: Final Embrace Horror
fields.description: Your constricting attack has become stronger and more lethal.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; Final Embrace; base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Final Embrace Master
fields.description: Few creatures can survive the crushing horror of your Final Embrace.
fields.prerequisites: Str 17, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; Ability Focus (constrict); Final Embrace; Final Embrace Horror; base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Flanking Foil
fields.description: Fighting multiple foes is easy for you.

fields.name: Fortified Armor Training
fields.description: You have learned to let your armor bear the brunt of the worst attacks.

fields.name: Furious Finish
fields.description: You channel all of your rage into one massive blow to crush your enemy.
fields.prerequisites: Rage class feature, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Gory Finish
fields.description: By drawing upon wells of savagery, you can slay your foe in creative and horrifyingly gruesome manners, intimidating nearby foes.

fields.name: Greater Channel Smite
fields.description: You empower your weapon with the might of your deity, which you discharge as you strike your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, Channel Smite, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Greater Rending Fury
fields.description: When your claws latch on to an opponent, the effect is bloody and horrific.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Rending Fury, Rending Fury, base attack bonus +12, rend special attack.

fields.name: Greater Snap Shot
fields.description: You can prey on any gap in your foe's guard with impunity, and with even greater range.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, Improved Snap Shot, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Snap Shot, base attack bonus +12.

fields.name: Greater Whip Mastery
fields.description: You can use a whip to make combat maneuvers with ease.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Whip Mastery, Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Guided Hand
fields.description: Your deity blesses any strike you make with that deity's favored weapon.
fields.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, Channel Smite, proficiency with your deity's favored weapon.

fields.name: Gunsmithing
fields.description: You know the secrets of repairing and restoring firearms.

fields.name: Hammer the Gap
fields.description: You repeatedly strike the same location, causing increasing amounts of damage.

fields.name: Harmonic Sage
fields.description: Your thorough understanding of acoustics in artificial surroundings allows you to improve the power of your bardic performance.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks.

fields.name: Haunted Gnome
fields.description: You use your gnome magic to take on an eerie illusory appearance.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome magic racial trait, Knowledge (arcana) 1 rank.

fields.name: Haunted Gnome Assault
fields.description: Discharging your disturbing glamer as you strike a telling blow, you haunt a foe with lingering fear.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome magic racial trait, Haunted Gnome, Knowledge (arcana) 3 ranks.

fields.name: Haunted Gnome Shroud
fields.description: Your disturbing glamer expands to make your exact location hard to pinpoint.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome magic racial trait, Haunted Gnome, Haunted Gnome Assault, Knowledge (arcana) 6 ranks.

fields.name: Hero's Display
fields.description: With a dramatic flourish you display your weapons to the crowd. Onlookers are elated, and your enemies are demoralized.
fields.prerequisites: Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus, and proficiency with the selected weapon.

fields.name: Hex Strike
fields.description: Chanting and cursing, you put a hex on your enemy as part of your unarmed strike.
fields.prerequisites: Hex class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Horse Master
fields.description: You blend horsemanship skills from disparate traditions into a seamless mounted combat technique.
fields.prerequisites: Expert trainer class feature (Advanced Player's Guide 33), Ride 6 ranks.

fields.name: Impact Critical Shot
fields.description: With a series of ranged attacks, you bring your foes to their knees or force them to move.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Point-Blank Shot, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Impaling Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits can skewer your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, Weapon Specialization with selected piercing melee weapon, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Improved Back to Back
fields.description: After much practice, you and an ally have become adept at fighting in close proximity to one another.

fields.name: Improved Charging Hurler
fields.description: Every muscle in your body adds its force to your thrown weapons.

fields.name: Improved Cleaving Finish
fields.description: You can cut down many opponents in a single strike.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Cleaving Finish, Great Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Improved Devastating Strike
fields.description: The fury and power channeled through your attack is enough to kill a lesser being outright.
fields.prerequisites: Devastating Strike, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +13.

fields.name: Improved Feint Partner
fields.description: Knowledge of your companions' tricks and techniques allow you to take even greater advantage of your allies' feints.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, Combat Reflexes, Feint Partner, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Improved Impaling Critical
fields.description: When you impale a target, you hinder its movement and can cause severe bleeding.
fields.prerequisites: Impaling Critical, Critical Focus, Weapon Specialization with selected piercing melee weapon, base attack bonus +13.

fields.name: Improved Rending Fury
fields.description: Honing the deadliness of your claws, you are a living hurricane of rending fury.
fields.prerequisites: Rending Fury, base attack bonus +9, rend special attack.

fields.name: Improved Snap Shot
fields.description: You can take advantage of your opponent's vulnerabilities from a greater distance, and without exposing yourself.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Snap Shot, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Improved Stalwart
fields.description: You can roll with the punches while simultaneously striking back at your attackers.
fields.prerequisites: Diehard, Endurance, Stalwart, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Improved Two-Weapon Feint
fields.description: Your primary weapon keeps a foe off balance, allowing you to slip your off-hand weapon past his defenses.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Improved Whip Mastery
fields.description: You are able to entangle opponents with the coils of your whip.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery, base attack bonus +5.

fields.name: Instant Judgment
fields.description: Your hastiest condemnations can have power.

fields.name: Intimidating Bane
fields.description: Your bane weapon strikes fear into your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Bane class feature, Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus, character level 8th.

fields.name: Janni Rush
fields.description: When you leap to the attack, your blows are like bolts from on high.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Janni Style, Janni Tempest, Acrobatics 8 ranks, Perform (dance) 8 ranks.

fields.name: Janni Style
fields.description: Your whirling fighting technique makes you difficult to hit.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 3 ranks, Perform (dance) 3 ranks.

fields.name: Janni Tempest
fields.description: Your gale of attacks easily throws your opponents off balance.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Janni Style, Acrobatics 5 ranks, Perform (dance) 5 ranks.

fields.name: Jawbreaker
fields.description: You deliver a powerful strike to the mouth, breaking teeth and bone.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist, Heal 6 ranks.

fields.name: Kirin Path
fields.description: You turn knowledge of your enemy into a flawless defense.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Kirin Strike, Kirin Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (arcana) 12 ranks, Knowledge (dungeoneering, local, nature, planes, or religion) 5 ranks.

fields.name: Kirin Strike
fields.description: You have read the texts of the perfect way, and know how identify to your enemies' weak spot.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Kirin Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (arcana) 9 ranks, Knowledge (dungeoneering, local, nature, planes, or religion) 3 ranks.

fields.name: Kirin Style
fields.description: Your study and your grace allows you to exploit your enemies' weaknesses.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (arcana) 6 ranks, Knowledge (dungeoneering, local, nature, planes, or religion) 1 rank.

fields.name: Knockout Artist
fields.description: You can throw devastating knockout punches.
fields.prerequisites: Sneak attack class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Landing Roll
fields.description: You have learned the technique of rolling safely away when an enemy trips you.

fields.name: Leaping Shot Deed
fields.description: You leap through the air, guns blazing.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Dodge, Mobility, base attack bonus +4.

fields.name: Mantis Style
fields.description: You have learned to target vital areas with crippling accuracy.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist, Heal 3 ranks.

fields.name: Mantis Torment
fields.description: Your knowledge of the mysteries of anatomy allows you to cause debilitating pain with a simple touch.
fields.prerequisites: Heal 9 ranks, Improved Unarmed Strike, Mantis Style, Mantis Wisdom, Stunning Fist.

fields.name: Mantis Wisdom
fields.description: Your knowledge of vital areas allows you to land debilitating strikes with precision.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Mantis Style, Stunning Fist, Heal 6 ranks.

fields.name: Marid Coldsnap
fields.description: You can summon a torrent of water to blast your enemies, chilling them to the bone.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 17, Elemental Fist**, Marid Spirit, Marid Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 11th.

fields.name: Marid Spirit
fields.description: You can manipulate cold energy to protect yourself and freeze your foes.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 15, Elemental Fist**, Marid Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Marid Style
fields.description: You conjure tendrils of icy water to strike your enemies from a distance.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Wis 15, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Master Combat Performer
fields.description: You are a master of the techniques and weapons of the arena and the stage.
fields.prerequisites: Performing Combatant or at least three performance feats, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Master Siege Engineer
fields.description: You are significantly faster at loading a siege engine, as well as a better shot.

fields.name: Masterful Display
