fields.description: You craft a special victory performance that causes the crowd to go wild.
fields.prerequisites: Dazzling Display, any two performance feats.

fields.name: Maximized Spellstrike
fields.description: You deal brutal damage against opponents caught unawares.
fields.prerequisites: Maximized magic magus arcana, weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw.

fields.name: Menacing Bane
fields.description: You are deadly when you team up with allies against a single foe.

fields.name: Merciful Bane
fields.description: You can use your bane ability to inf lict nonlethal damage.

fields.name: Mocking Dance
fields.description: You do a little dance that mocks your foe and entertains the crowd.

fields.name: Monastic Legacy
fields.description: Your formal unarmed training continues to bolster your training in other areas.
fields.prerequisites: Still mind class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Monkey Moves
fields.description: You scramble around your foes, moving and striking in an erratic fashion.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Monkey Style, Acrobatics 8 ranks, Climb 8 ranks.

fields.name: Monkey Shine
fields.description: You combine acrobatics and opportunity to devastating effect against your opponent.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Monkey Moves, Monkey Style, Stunning Fist, Acrobatics 11 ranks, Climb 11 ranks.

fields.name: Monkey Style
fields.description: Your unarmed fighting style is nimble and unpredictable, full of ground rolls and short leaps.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 5 ranks, Climb 5 ranks.

fields.name: Moonlight Stalker
fields.description: You are adept at using shadows to conceal your attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Bluff 3 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.

fields.name: Moonlight Stalker Feint
fields.description: You strike through the shadows so quickly that your opponent can barely react to your attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Moonlight Stalker, Bluff 6 ranks, darkvision or lowlight vision racial trait.

fields.name: Moonlight Stalker Master
fields.description: You leave your opponents swinging at shadows while you slide elusively through the darkness.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, Moonlight Stalker, Moonlight Stalker Feint, Bluff 9 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.

fields.name: Murderer's Circle
fields.description: After savaging your foe, you circle like a hunter ready for the kill.

fields.name: Neckbreaker
fields.description: With a quick jerk, you snap an enemy's neck.
fields.prerequisites: Bonebreaker, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Jawbreaker, Stunning Fist, Heal 12 ranks.

fields.name: Net Adept
fields.description: You have trained to use the net as a melee weapon.
fields.prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Net and Trident
fields.description: Your skill with lighter weapons allows you to wield one alongside your net.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Two-Weapon Fighting.

fields.name: Net Maneuvering
fields.description: With sweeping movements and brute force, you can use your net to put foes at a disadvantage.
fields.prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, base attack bonus +3.

fields.name: Net Trickery
fields.description: You have become very proficient at using your net to hinder your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Net Maneuvering, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Nightmare Fist
fields.description: You are even more deadly in magical darkness.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Intimidate 1 rank, ability to create magical darkness.

fields.name: Nightmare Striker
fields.description: Your faerie fire not only illuminates your foes, but it also shows you their weaknesses.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Nightmare Fist, Nightmare Weaver, Stunning Fist, Heal 5 ranks, ability to cast faerie fire.

fields.name: Nightmare Weaver
fields.description: You can use your ability to create magical darkness to terrorize enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Nightmare Fist, Intimidate 2 ranks, ability to cast darkness.

fields.name: No Name
fields.description: You don't need an elaborate disguise to keep your identity under wraps.
fields.prerequisites: Grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Bluff 4 ranks.

fields.name: Opening Volley
fields.description: Your ranged assault leaves your foe disoriented and vulnerable to your melee attack.

fields.name: Pack Attack
fields.description: You are skilled at surrounding your enemies.

fields.name: Panther Claw
fields.description: You unleash a rapid series of blows on foes that attempt to attack you when you move.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 15, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Panther Style.

fields.name: Panther Parry
fields.description: Your vicious strikes impair your foe's ability to attack you when you move.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 15, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Panther Claw, Panther Style.

fields.name: Panther Style
fields.description: You can strike back at enemies who attack you when you move.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Passing Trick
fields.description: Slipping past a foe gives you the chance to feint.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Dodge, Improved Feint, Mobility, size Small or smaller.

fields.name: Performance Weapon Mastery
fields.description: You wield all your weapons with the flair of a performer.

fields.name: Performing Combatant
fields.description: You treat every combat as a performance, bringing flare and showmanship.
fields.prerequisites: Dazzling Display, any one performance feat.

fields.name: Pin Down
fields.description: You easily block enemy escapes.

fields.name: Pinning Knockout
fields.description: An opponent you have pinned is easy for you to knock out.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Pinning Rend
fields.description: You tear flesh when you damage an opponent that you have pinned.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Pinpoint Poisoner
fields.description: You deftly use specially prepared needles to apply poison for maximum effect.
fields.prerequisites: Poison use class feature, Craft (alchemy) 6 ranks, Adder Strike, Improved Unarmed Strike, Two-Weapon Fighting or flurry of blows class feature.

fields.name: Planar Wild Shape
fields.description: You can infuse your wild shape with planar strength.
fields.prerequisites: Wild shape class feature, Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks.

fields.name: Prone Shooter
fields.description: While prone, you use the ground to stabilize your aim while using a crossbow or firearm.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus (crossbow or firearm), base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Prone Slinger
fields.description: Your sideways sling release allows you to launch bullets and stones even while prone.

fields.name: Quick Bull Rush
fields.description: You can barrel into your opponent and follow this with an attack.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Quick Dirty Trick
fields.description: You can perpetrate a dirty trick and deliver an attack before your opponent is the wiser.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Quick Drag
fields.description: You drag your enemy and deliver a punishing blow.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Quick Reposition
fields.description: Your opponent becomes an unwitting dance partner, following your lead while you fight.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Quick Steal
fields.description: You are adept at relieving foes of their belongings even while you strike.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Steal, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Raging Brutality
fields.description: You expend some of your rage to strike your opponents with a more powerful weapon blow.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, rage class feature, Power Attack, base attack bonus +12.

fields.name: Raging Deathblow
fields.description: Every killing blow gives you a surge of vitality, further fueling your rage.

fields.name: Raging Hurler
fields.description: An opponent can do little to evade your wrathful pitching of weapons and objects.

fields.name: Raging Throw
fields.description: You expend some of your rage to throw one opponent at another.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Con 13, rage class feature, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Rapid Grappler
fields.description: You are a quick hand at grappling.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Rebounding Leap
fields.description: Your riding and lancing expertise allows you to enter and leave the saddle with great speed.
fields.prerequisites: Leaping lance class feature, Acrobatics 5 ranks, Ride 11 ranks.

fields.name: Rebuffing Reduction
fields.description: Your damage reduction can turn the force of blows back on your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, damage reduction, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Rending Fury
fields.description: You easily tear your enemies limb from limb with your natural attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6, rend special attack.

fields.name: Revelation Strike
fields.description: Your unarmed strike brings a revelation down upon your foe.
fields.prerequisites: Revelation class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Rhetorical Flourish
fields.description: You rapidly change topics and employ confusing rhetoric to distract people from your true intent.

fields.name: Ricochet Shot Deed
fields.description: You can ricochet a firearm shot off the wall and still hit your target.
fields.prerequisites: Grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Blind-Fight.

fields.name: Righteous Healing
fields.description: Your healing spells are more potent when you have a judgment active.

fields.name: Sap Adept
fields.description: You know just where to hit to knock the sense out of your foe.

fields.name: Sap Master
fields.description: You knock the sense out of foes with a well-timed surprise attack.

fields.name: Savage Display
fields.description: With your victory and a roar, you push yourself on with increased savagery.

fields.name: School Strike
fields.description: You focus the secrets of your school of wizardry into your unarmed strike.
fields.prerequisites: Wizard school class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Sea Legs
fields.description: You have a sailor's instincts for moving about while aboard seagoing vessels.

fields.name: Secret Stash Deed
fields.description: You are so skilled at stashing small packets of firearm ammunition and black powder on your person that you sometimes surprise yourself when you find them.
fields.prerequisites: Grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Sleight of Hand 1 rank.

fields.name: Seize the Moment
fields.description: You and your allies are poised to pounce whenever one of you scores a telling blow.

fields.name: Shaitan Earthblast
fields.description: With a forceful stomp you release a blast of acid from the earth to burn your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 17, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, Shaitan Skin, Shaitan Style, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 11th.

fields.name: Shaitan Skin
fields.description: You can manipulate acid to shield yourself and disable your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 15, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, Shaitan Style, base attack bonus +11 or monk level 9th.

fields.name: Shaitan Style
fields.description: You strike with the caustic forces from within the earth.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Wis 15, Elemental Fist**, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Shake It Off
fields.description: You support your allies and help them recover from crippling effects.

fields.name: Shapeshifter Foil
fields.description: Your command of shapeshifting magic can disrupt similar effects in others.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (arcana) 5 ranks or Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks, ability to use any polymorph effect.

fields.name: Shapeshifting Hunter
fields.description: You blend your knowledge of foes and your shapeshifting abilities together.
fields.prerequisites: Favored enemy class feature, wild shape class feature.

fields.name: Shared Judgment
fields.description: You extend the benefits of your judgment to an ally.

fields.name: Siege Commander
fields.description: Under your leadership, the time required to assemble and move a siege engine is greatly reduced.
fields.prerequisites: Craft (siege weapon) 5 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 1 rank.

fields.name: Siege Engineer
fields.description: You are proficient with all siege weaponry.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 5 ranks, proficiency with one siege engine.

fields.name: Siege Gunner
fields.description: Aiming outsized siege weapons poses little difficulty for you.

fields.name: Signature Deed
fields.description: You are known for performing a particular deed, and can perform it with greater ease.

fields.name: Skilled Driver
fields.description: Choose a type a type of vehicle (either air, land, or water). You are more skilled when driving that vehicle.

fields.name: Slayer's Knack
fields.description: You know how to battle your favored enemies with such efficacy that any weapon you wield against them becomes more deadly.
fields.prerequisites: Favored enemy class feature, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Sling Flail
fields.description: You can use your loaded sling to effectively strike at nearby foes.

fields.name: Snake Fang
fields.description: You can unleash attacks against an opponent that has dropped its guard.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Snake Sidewind, Snake Style, Acrobatics 6 ranks, Sense Motive 9 ranks.

fields.name: Snake Style
fields.description: You watch your foe's every movement and then punch through its defense.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 1 rank, Sense Motive 3 ranks.

fields.name: Snap Shot
fields.description: With a ranged weapon, you can take advantage of any opening in your opponent's defenses.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Snapping Turtle Clutch
fields.description: Your unarmed style allows you to turn your opponent's attack into an opportunity.
fields.prerequisites: Snapping Turtle Style, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +3 or monk level 3rd.

fields.name: Snapping Turtle Shell
fields.description: Your guarding hand is almost magical in its skill at def lecting incoming blows.
fields.prerequisites: Snapping Turtle Clutch, Snapping Turtle Style, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Snapping Turtle Style
fields.description: Your deft unarmed style allows you to shield your body from harm.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +1 or monk level 1st.

fields.name: Sneaking Precision
fields.description: Your knowledge of your enemies' vulnerable spots is especially punishing.
fields.prerequisites: Sneak attack class feature, Critical Focus, any critical feat, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Sorcerous Strike
fields.description: The power flowing through your veins also flows through your unarmed strike.
fields.prerequisites: Sorcerer bloodline class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Spell Bane
fields.description: While your bane weapon is active, creatures that your bane affects find it more difficult to resist your spells.

fields.name: Spinning Throw
fields.description: You whirl your foe around and then let go.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Bull Rush, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Ki Throw.

fields.name: Splintering Weapon
fields.description: Your fragile weapon works to your advantage, breaking off fragments in wounds you inf lict.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, proficient with weapon, weapon made of primitive material.

fields.name: Stage Combatant
fields.description: You are a master of stage and nonlethal combats.

fields.name: Stalwart
fields.description: You adopt a defensive stance that allows you to absorb and redirect hits.

fields.name: Stealth Synergy
fields.description: Working closely with an ally, you are able to move like twin shadows.

fields.name: Strangler
fields.description: Throttling the life out of enemies is second nature to you.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, sneak attack +1d6, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike.

fields.name: Strong Comeback
fields.description: You learn quickly from past mistakes.

fields.name: Stunning Pin
fields.description: You can render a pinned foe temporarily incapacitated.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist.

fields.name: Sure Grasp
fields.description: Your quick ref lexes and skill at climbing keep you from falling to your doom.

fields.name: Sword and Pistol
fields.description: You effortlessly pair melee and ranged weaponry.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Snap Shot, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Tandem Trip
fields.description: You know how to work together to trip your foes.

fields.name: Target of Opportunity
fields.description: You and your allies pelt your enemies with a deadly barrage of missiles.

fields.name: Team Pickpocketing
fields.description: You distract a mark with friendly conversation while your partner robs the victim blind.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, Sleight of Hand 1 rank.

fields.name: Tiger Claws
fields.description: You can sacrifice multiple attacks to make a single devastating strike.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Tiger Style, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 5th.

fields.name: Tiger Pounce
fields.description: Your unarmed strikes are as precise as they are powerful, but they leave you open and you can pursue foes with blinding speed.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Power Attack, Tiger Claws, Tiger Style, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 8th.

fields.name: Tiger Style
fields.description: Your unarmed fighting style emulates the strength and ferocity of a tiger.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +3 or monk level 3rd.

fields.name: Trapper's Setup
fields.description: You have an instinct for waiting until just the right moment to spring a hazard or trap.

fields.name: Twin Thunders
fields.description: When you fight giants, your powerful blows combine with skills learned from generations of your people to quickly even the odds.
fields.prerequisites: Dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Two-Weapon Fighting or flurry of blows class feature, Weapon Focus with both wielded weapons.

fields.name: Twin Thunders Flurry
fields.description: Your dual bludgeoning strikes are especially deadly when you are fighting giants.
fields.prerequisites: Dwarf or gnome; defensive training racial trait; Improved Two-Weapon Fighting and Two-Weapon Fighting, or flurry of blows class feature; Twin Thunders; Weapon Focus with both wielded weapons; base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Twin Thunders Master
fields.description: With thunderous simultaneous strikes, you can batter a mighty giant into submission.
fields.prerequisites: Dwarf or gnome; defensive training racial trait; Improved Two-Weapon Fighting and Two-Weapon Fighting, or flurry of blows class feature; Twin Thunders; Twin Thunders Flurry; Weapon Focus with both wielded weapons; base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Two-Handed Thrower
fields.description: You hurl weapons with both hands and with great force, sometimes using a whirling technique to send your weapon flying through the air at tremendous speeds.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Feint
fields.description: You use one weapon to distract your enemy while slipping another past his defenses.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Two-Weapon Fighting.

fields.name: Vicious Stomp
fields.description: You take advantage of the moment to brutally kick an enemy when he is down.

fields.name: Wave Strike
fields.description: You present a serene facade until you unsheathe your weapon and strike in one fluid motion.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw, Bluff 1 rank.

fields.name: Whip Mastery
fields.description: Your superior expertise with this weapon does not provoke attacks of opportunity from your enemies.

fields.name: Abundant Revelations
fields.description: You can plumb the depths of your mystery to use your revelations more often.

fields.name: Accursed Critical
fields.description: Your spells carry an embedded curse that manifests when they strike true.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, ability to cast bestow curse or major curse, caster level 9th.

fields.name: Accursed Hex
fields.description: You can make a second attempt at failed hexes.

fields.name: Advanced Ranger Trap
fields.description: Your ranger traps are especially difficult to notice and avoid.

fields.name: Antagonize
fields.description: Whether with biting remarks or hurtful words, you are adept at making creatures angry with you.

fields.name: Blighted Critical
fields.description: With a critical hit from a spell or spell-like ability, you give the target a minor spellblight.

fields.name: Blighted Critical Mastery
fields.description: You control the type of spellblight your critical hits give your opponent.

fields.name: Burning Spell
fields.description: You cause creatures to take extra damage when you affect them with a spell that has the acid or fire descriptor.

fields.name: Channeled Shield Wall
fields.description: You draw on your channel energy to enhance the protective ability of your shield and those of adjacent allies.
fields.prerequisites: Channel energy, 3d6 prof iciency with a shield.

fields.name: Concussive Spell
fields.description: You cause creatures to be disoriented when you affect them with a spell that has the sonic descriptor.

fields.name: Create Reliquary Arms and Shields
fields.description: Your magical creations are infused with divine power.
fields.prerequisites: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, ability to cast consecrate or desecrate.

fields.name: Create Sanguine Elixir
fields.description: You can condense a fraction of your bloodline's power into a powerful elixir.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 15, Brew Potion, Craft (alchemy) 12 ranks, sorcerer level 3rd.

fields.name: Defending Eidolon
fields.description: You have trained your eidolon to protect you.

fields.name: Deny Death
fields.description: Your ki is so strong that it can deny death.

fields.name: Detect Expertise
fields.description: You can detect the mystic specialty of a foe.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13; ability to cast detect chaos, detect evil, detect good, detect law, or detect magic.

fields.name: Die for Your Master
fields.description: Your tumor familiar goes to any length to save your life.

fields.name: Divine Interference
fields.description: You can convert a spell to interfere with an enemy's attack.

fields.name: Dragonbane Aura
fields.description: Those within your dragonbane aura gain the same protection that you do.
fields.prerequisites: Aura of courage class feature, caster level 8th.

fields.name: Echoing Spell
fields.description: You have learned how to release most, but not all, of a spell's potential when you cast it.

fields.name: Eldritch Heritage
fields.description: You are descended from a long line of sorcerers, and some portion of their power flows in your veins.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Skill Focus with the class skill of bloodline selected for this feat (see below), character level 3rd.

fields.name: Ensemble
fields.description: You can create an ensemble of skilled and amateur performers to aid you in your performance.

fields.name: Evolved Familiar
fields.description: Your familiar is different from others of its kind.

fields.name: Exploit Lore
fields.description: You can use your knowledge of a creature's weaknesses to deliver a driving and relentless assault against it.
fields.prerequisites: Monster lore class feature, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Extra Arcana
fields.description: You have unlocked the secret of a new magus arcana.

fields.name: Extra Arcane Pool
fields.description: You have learned how to draw more power from your arcane pool.

fields.name: Extended Bane
fields.description: Your dedication knows no limit. Your wrath dies hard.

fields.name: Extra Cantrips or Orisons
fields.description: You are a master of minor spells.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast cantrips or orisons.

fields.name: Extra Evolution
fields.description: Your eidolon has more evolutions.

fields.name: Extra Ranger Trap
fields.description: You can use ranger traps more often.

fields.name: Extra Summons
fields.description: You can summon monsters more often each day.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast summon monster as a spell-like ability, summoner 1st.

fields.name: Eyes of Judgment
fields.description: The true motives of creatures cannot escape your discerning gaze.
fields.prerequisites: Detect alignment class feature, caster level 6th.

fields.name: Fast Empathy
fields.description: Your empathic attunement to nature connects you swiftly with bestial minds.
fields.prerequisites: Handle Animal 5 ranks, wild empathy class feature.

fields.name: Favored Judgment
fields.description: Your judgment against a particular type of creature is particularly harsh.

fields.name: Fearless Aura
fields.description: Your aura of courage becomes more potent, as your steadfast resolve is also manifested by your allies.
fields.prerequisites: Aura of courage class feature, caster level 8th.

fields.name: Fire Music
fields.description: Your ability to command fire and bardic music has created a strange blend of both magics.
fields.prerequisites: Spellcraft 5 ranks, ability to cast bard spells, ability to cast an arcane fire spell from some other spellcasting class.

fields.name: Flaring Spell
fields.description: You dazzle creatures when you affect them with a spell that has the fire, light, or electricity descriptor.

fields.name: Focused Eidolon
fields.description: Your bond with your eidolon helps to focus your concentration.

fields.name: Gliding Steps
fields.description: You skate across the surface of the earth as if gliding on ice.
fields.prerequisites: Dodge, Mobility, Nimble Moves, ki pool.

fields.name: Grant Initiative
fields.description: Not only are you a master at taking the initiative, but you can also grant it to someone else.

fields.name: Greater Blighted Critical
fields.description: Your critical hit from a spell or spell-like ability aff licts the target with a major spellblight.

fields.name: Greater Eldritch Heritage
fields.description: Your discovered bloodline power reaches its zenith.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 17, Eldritch Heritage, Improved Eldritch Heritage, character level 17th.

fields.name: Greater Mercy
fields.description: Your mercy has incredible recuperative properties.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, lay on hands class feature, mercy class feature.

fields.name: Greater Spell Specialization
fields.description: You can sacrifice a prepared spell in order to spontaneously cast your specialized spell.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Spell Focus, Spell Specialization, able to prepare 5th-level spells.

fields.name: Greater Wild Empathy
fields.description: Your natural empathy stretches across the world of nature.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks, wild empathy class feature.

fields.name: Implant Bomb
fields.description: You can attach a bomb to a creature that explodes when the creature dies or after 24 hours.
fields.prerequisites: Heal 5 ranks, delayed bomb alchemist discovery.

fields.name: Improved Eldritch Heritage
fields.description: The power of your discovered bloodline continues to grow.

fields.name: Improved Monster Lore
fields.description: You are obsessed with the abilities and weaknesses of monsters.

fields.name: Insightful Gaze
fields.description: In your personal interactions, you notice what others don't. It's hard to get anything past you.
fields.prerequisites: Stern gaze class feature, Sense Motive 5 ranks.

fields.name: Intimidating Gaze
fields.description: There is something in your eyes that scares people.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13+, stern gaze class feature, Intimidate 5 ranks.

fields.name: Judgment Surge
fields.description: Once per day, the power of your faith surges, further empowering your judgments.

fields.name: Ki Stand
fields.description: If an opponent knocks you down, you swiftly rebound with an attack.

fields.name: Learn Ranger Trap
fields.description: You learn how to create one kind of ranger trap.

fields.name: Life Lure
fields.description: Your channeled positive energy is irresistibly sweet to nearby undead.

fields.name: Moonlight Summons
fields.description: Your summoned minions are infused with the power of the moon.
fields.prerequisites: Spell Focus (conjuration), able to cast summon nature's ally.

fields.name: Mystic Stride
fields.description: Enchanted vegetation does not bar your path.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Nimble Moves, woodland stride class feature.

fields.name: Oracular Intuition
fields.description: You are highly sensitive to magic and changes in a person's demeanor.

fields.name: Painful Anchor
fields.description: Evil outsiders take damage when they attempt to connect to other planes.

fields.name: Piercing Spell
fields.description: Your studies have helped you develop methods to overcome spell resistance.

fields.name: Planar Preservationist
fields.description: You know how to preserve and reconstitute extraplanar monsters as well as normal animals.

fields.name: Powerful Shape
fields.description: Your wild shapes are mighty and muscular.
fields.prerequisites: Wild shape class feature, druid level 8th.

fields.name: Prodigy
fields.description: You are naturally skilled at arts, professions, and the acquisition of knowledge.

fields.name: Prophetic Visionary
fields.description: Your oracular abilities give you a glimpse into the future.

fields.name: Pure Faith
fields.description: Not only are you immune to disease, like most paladins, but you also are highly resilient to poisons.

fields.name: Quarterstaff Master
fields.description: You can wield a quarterstaff as either a two-handed or one-handed weapon.

fields.name: Quick Channel
fields.description: Your divine energies flash with dazzling speed.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (religion) 5 ranks, channel energy class feature.

fields.name: Quick Wild Shape
fields.description: You sacrifice power for speed in changing form.
fields.prerequisites: Wild shape class feature, caster level 8th.

fields.name: Radiant Charge
fields.description: When you charge, you do so with the power of faith.

fields.name: Remote Bomb
fields.description: You can set off your delayed bombs at great distances.

fields.name: Resilient Eidolon
fields.description: Your link with your eidolon is strong enough that it can remain with you for a short time after you fall unconscious or are killed.

fields.name: Reward of Grace
fields.description: When you lay on hands, divine energy ripples through you, granting you grace.

fields.name: Reward of Life
fields.description: When you lay on hands, you are also healed.

fields.name: Ricochet Splash Weapon
fields.description: Even when your thrown splash weapons miss, they are especially dangerous.

fields.name: Rime Spell
fields.description: Creatures damaged by your spells with the cold descriptor become entangled.

fields.name: Sacred Summons
fields.description: The minions of your divine patrons stand ready to answer your call.
fields.prerequisites: Aura class feature, ability to cast summon monster.

fields.name: Sense Link
fields.description: When you and your eidolon share senses, your combined minds grant you exceptional powers of observation.

fields.name: Shaping Focus
fields.description: Your powers of shapeshifting outstrip your dabbling in the druidic faith.
fields.prerequisites: Wild shape class feature, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.

fields.name: Sin Seer
fields.description: Unlike others who have taken the oath against undeath (see page 60), your preoccupation with the undead does not cloud your view of good and evil.

fields.name: Skeleton Summoner
fields.description: The walking dead respond to your call.
fields.prerequisites: Spell Focus (necromancy), ability to cast summon monster.

fields.name: Sorcerous Bloodstrike
fields.description: You can regain power when you kill a creature.

fields.name: Spell Bluff
fields.description: You know the principles of arcane dueling, and when fighting other spellcasters, you have learned to hide the true nature of your spells until the last possible moment.

fields.name: Spell Hex
fields.description: You can transform a 1st-level spell into a hex.

fields.name: Spell Specialization
fields.description: Select one spell. You cast that spell with greater than normal power.

fields.name: Spellsong
fields.description: You can blend the power of your performance and spellcasting.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, bardic performance class ability, able to cast 1st-level spells.

fields.name: Split Hex
fields.description: You can split the effect of one of your targeted hexes, affecting another creature you can see.

fields.name: Split Major Hex
fields.description: You can split the effect of one of your targeted hexes, affecting another creature you can see.

fields.name: Spontaneous Metafocus
fields.description: You can focus to combine one of your known spells and metamagic feats.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, one metamagic feat, able to spontaneously cast spells.

fields.name: Starlight Summons
fields.description: Your summoned minions slink along under the shadows of the stars.
fields.prerequisites: Spell Focus (conjuration), able to cast summon nature's ally.

fields.name: Sunlight Summons
fields.description: Your summoned minions shine with the power of the sun.
fields.prerequisites: Spell Focus (conjuration), able to cast summon nature's ally.

fields.name: Superior Summoning
fields.description: You can summon more creatures.

fields.name: Thanatopic Spell
fields.description: Your spells can pierce wards against negative energy and even affect undead targets.

fields.name: Theurgy
fields.description: You can blend the power of arcane and divine magic.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Int or Cha 13, able to cast 1st-level arcane spells, able to cast 1st-level divine spells.

fields.name: Thoughtful Discernment
fields.description: Thinking back, you discover a lie in what you once thought to be words of truth.

fields.name: Threnodic Spell
fields.description: You can convert mind-affecting magic to necromantic power capable of controlling undead.

fields.name: Toppling Spell
fields.description: Your spells with the force descriptor knock the affected creatures prone.

fields.name: Tripping Staff
fields.description: You can make a trip attack with your quarterstaff.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Weapon Focus (quarterstaff), base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Tripping Twirl
fields.description: You can make a trip attack with a quarterstaff on all adjacent enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Tripping Staff, Weapon Focus (quarterstaff), Weapon Specialization (quarterstaff), base attack bonus +12.

fields.name: Ultimate Mercy
fields.description: By using lay on hands, you can bring the dead back to life.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 19, Greater Mercy, lay on hands, mercy class feature.

fields.name: Ultimate Resolve
fields.description: Your aura of resolve does not fall with you.

fields.name: Uncanny Alertness
fields.description: Your research into arcana and the nature of reality has given you heightened senses.

fields.name: Uncanny Concentration
fields.description: You have learned to enter a deeper state when casting spells, allowing you to shrug off distractions, damage, weather effects, and even the effects of other spells.

fields.name: Undead Master
fields.description: You can marshal vast armies of the undead to serve you.
fields.prerequisites: Spell focus (necromancy), the ability to cast animate dead or command undead.

fields.name: Unsanctioned Detection
fields.description: You can focus your ability to detect evil for more practical or mundane purposes

fields.name: Unsanctioned Knowledge
fields.description: You have searched though forbidden texts and are privy to powerful but proscribed magic.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, ability to cast 1st-level paladin spells.

fields.name: Versatile Channeler
fields.description: You can choose to channel positive and negative energy.
fields.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, necromancer or neutrally aligned cleric (see below).

fields.name: Vigilant Eidolon
fields.description: Your eidolon is highly observant, and its link with you increases your own watchfulness.

fields.name: Voice of the Sibyl
fields.description: Your voice is strangely compelling.

fields.name: Warrior Priest
fields.description: Your religion is both a shield and a weapon in battle.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast divine spells, domain or mystery class feature.

fields.name: Wild Speech
fields.description: You speak with the tongue of men and beasts.
fields.prerequisites: Druid level 6th, wild shape class feature.

fields.name: Witch Knife
fields.description: You empower your witch spells by incorporating the use of a special ceremonial knife during your castings.

fields.name: Word of Healing
fields.description: Using the same divine energy as your lay on hands ability, you can heal others at a distance.

fields.name: Brewmaster
fields.description: You can concoct potent brews.

fields.name: Cleave Through
fields.description: You are ferocious at hewing smaller opponents.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +11, dwarf.

fields.name: Cloven Helm
fields.description: Your helm turns aside lethal blows.
fields.prerequisites: Dented Helm, Hard-Headed, base attack bonus +11, dwarf.

fields.name: Dented Helm
fields.description: Your helm protects you from hard hits.

fields.name: Giant Killer
fields.description: Your cleaving strokes menace giants and larger foes.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Goblin Cleaver, Orc Hewer, Power Attack, Strike Back, base attack bonus +11, dwarf.

fields.name: Goblin Cleaver
fields.description: You are ferocious at hewing smaller opponents.

fields.name: Hard-Headed
fields.description: Your thick skull is almost a weapon unto itself.

fields.name: Ledge Walker
fields.description: You negotiate tiny ledges like a mountain goat.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, dwarf, mountaineer or stability racial trait.

fields.name: Orc Hewer
fields.description: You are ferocious at hewing your enemies, especially orcs.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Goblin Cleaver, Power Attack, dwarf.

fields.name: Shatterspell
fields.description: Your mighty blows shatter your enemy's magic.

fields.name: Toxic Recovery
fields.description: Your system recuperates from the effects of poisons with astonishing speed.

fields.name: Attuned to the Wild
fields.description: You share a strong mystic connection with one type of wilderness terrain.

fields.name: Elven Battle Training
fields.description: You have been specially trained to wield a variety of traditional elven weapons.

fields.name: Guardian of the Wild
fields.description: Your mystic connection with the wilderness enhances your ability to react to threats.

fields.name: Mage of the Wild
fields.description: Your mystic connection with the wilderness enhances your spellcasting.

fields.name: Spirit of the Wild
fields.description: Your mystic connection with one type of wilderness has grown even stronger.
fields.prerequisites: Attuned to the Wild, Guardian of the Wild, elf.

fields.name: Casual Illusionist
fields.description: You can use your innate magic to create minor illusions that augment your efforts at trickery and deceit.

fields.name: Expanded Resistance
fields.description: You have expanded your natural resistance to magic to encompass different kinds of magic.

fields.name: Gnome Weapon Focus
fields.description: Your extensive training with traditional gnome weapons gives you an advantage.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, gnome, proficient with all martial weapons.

fields.name: Great Hatred
fields.description: Your rage burns with vast intensity.

fields.name: Vast Hatred
fields.description: Your rage stretches beyond normal bounds.

fields.name: Discerning Eye
fields.description: You are not easily fooled by illusions and forgeries.
fields.prerequisites: Elf or half-elf, keen senses racial trait.

fields.name: Elven Spirit
fields.description: Although you are of mixed heritage, you are closer to your elven relatives and the magic in their blood flows freely in your veins.

fields.name: Exile's Path
fields.description: A lifetime spent shunned by others and eschewing your heritage makes you resistant to efforts to pry inside of your mind.

fields.name: Half-Drow Paragon
fields.description: Your drow blood is particularly strong.
fields.prerequisites: Drow-blooded and drow magic racial traits, half-elf.

fields.name: Human Spirit
fields.description: Your blood burns with the passion and unyielding quest for self-improvement displayed so prominently by your human relatives.

fields.name: Multitalented Mastery
fields.description: You are adept at numerous disciplines.
fields.prerequisites: Character level 5th, half-elf, multitalented racial trait.

fields.name: Neither Elf nor Human
fields.description: You have removed yourself from your heritage so thoroughly that even magic does not recognize you.
fields.prerequisites: Exile's Path, Seen and Unseen, character level 11th, half-elf.

fields.name: Seen and Unseen
fields.description: Your anonymity makes you difficult to find through magical or mundane means, and you have learned how to combat both of your progenitor races.

fields.name: Shared Manipulation
fields.description: You can subtly bolster allies' ability to misdirect and infuriate their enemies.

fields.name: Beast Rider
fields.description: You gain the service of a monstrous companion or mount.
fields.prerequisites: Animal companion or mount class feature, character level 7th, half-orc or orc.

fields.name: Blood Vengeance
fields.description: Seeing an ally fall in combat fills you with a raging and murderous fury.

fields.name: Destroyer's Blessing
fields.description: Breaking things adds to your power.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Ferocious Resolve
fields.description: Your orc heritage allows you to fight on.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, half-orc, orc ferocity racial trait.

fields.name: Ferocious Summons
fields.description: Your summoned creatures gain your ferocity.
fields.prerequisites: Augment Summoning, Spell Focus (conjuration), half-orc or orc.

fields.name: Ferocious Tenacity
fields.description: You spit in the face of death.
fields.prerequisites: Ferocity racial trait, half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Gore Fiend
fields.description: Horrible wounds, whether on yourself or your enemies, make your blood sing.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Horde Charge
fields.description: When you charge with an ally, you are more deadly.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, half-orc or orc.

fields.name: Improved Surprise Follow-Through
fields.description: You follow up an attack with a surprising series of sweeping blows.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Great Cleave, Power Attack, Surprise Follow Through, base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Resilient Brute
fields.description: You absorb punishment others find deadly.

fields.name: Surprise Follow-Through
fields.description: When striking one opponent, you catch its ally off guard.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Sympathetic Rage
fields.description: Seeing an ally rage fills you with your own fury.

fields.name: Tenacious Survivor
fields.description: Your spirit lingers long after any other's would have passed on.
fields.prerequisites: Con 13, Diehard, Endurance, half-orc or orc.

fields.name: Thrill of the Kill
fields.description: Killing fuels your rage.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Adaptive Fortune
fields.description: Your luck takes on almost legendary proportions.
fields.prerequisites: Fortunate One, adaptable luck racial trait, character level 10th, halfling.

fields.name: Blundering Defense
fields.description: Your feverish and sometimes comical defensive techniques offer enough distraction to aid allies.

fields.name: Cautious Fighter
fields.description: You care more about survival than victory.

fields.name: Courageous Resolve
fields.description: Even when others run, you tend to stand your ground.
fields.prerequisites: Craven racial trait or fearless racial trait, halfling.

fields.name: Desperate Swing
fields.description: You land your most telling blows in desperate situations.
fields.prerequisites: Cautious Fighter, base attack bonus +1, halfling.

fields.name: Fortunate One
fields.description: You have an even greater knack than most halflings for adaptable luck.

fields.name: Improved Low Blow
fields.description: You are adept at hitting larger opponents where it hurts.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +4, halfling, low-blow racial trait.

fields.name: Lucky Healer
fields.description: Your luck allows you to draw from magical healing far more efficiently than most.

fields.name: Lucky Strike
fields.description: Your luck increases the potency of your weapon attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, adaptive luck racial trait, halfling.

fields.name: Risky Striker
fields.description: You can make yourself a little more vulnerable to larger creatures in order to land a devastating blow.

fields.name: Sure and Fleet
fields.description: You are both fast and careful.
fields.prerequisites: Fleet of foot racial trait, halfling.

fields.name: Surprise Strike
fields.description: You actually seem to do more damage when frantically trying to avoid your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Cautious Fighter, Desperate Swing, base attack bonus +6, halfling.

fields.name: Uncanny Defense
fields.description: Your instinct for self-preservation gives you many advantages.
fields.prerequisites: Cautious Fighter, base attack bonus +3, halfling.

fields.name: Bestow Luck
fields.description: You are extremely lucky and sometimes your allies are as well.

fields.name: Critical Versatility
fields.description: An open mind and combat training grant versatility to your critical hits.

fields.name: Dauntless Destiny
fields.description: Your ability to avert disaster is impressive.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Fearless Curiosity, Intimidate 10 ranks, human.

fields.name: Defiant Luck
fields.description: You can sometimes defiantly shrug off spells and attacks that would kill a lesser creature.

fields.name: Fast Learner
fields.description: You progress gain extra versatility.

fields.name: Fearless Curiosity
fields.description: Your desire to see and experience the world overrides healthy caution.

fields.name: Heroic Will
fields.description: Your indomitable will breaks free from mental shackles.
fields.prerequisites: Iron Will, base Will save +4, human.

fields.name: Huntmaster
fields.description: You are an expert trainer of horses, hounds, falcons, or hunting cats.
fields.prerequisites: Handle Animal 1 rank; either the animal companion, divine bond (mount), or mount class feature; human.

fields.name: Improved Improvisation
fields.description: You are masterful in your improvisation.

fields.name: Improvisation
fields.description: You can figure out how to do almost anything.

fields.name: Inexplicable Luck
fields.description: Others are often dumfounded by your luck.

fields.name: Intimidating Confidence
fields.description: You have boundless faith in your success.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Fearless Curiosity, Intimidate 5 ranks, human.

fields.name: Martial Mastery
fields.description: You broaden your study of weapons to encompass multiple similar weapons.

fields.name: Martial Versatility
fields.description: You further broaden your study of weapons to encompass multiple similar weapons.

fields.name: Surge of Success
fields.description: Your success drives your further actions.

fields.name: Angel Wings
fields.description: Feathered wings sprout from your back.

fields.name: Angelic Blood
fields.description: Your blood is infused with holy power.

fields.name: Angelic Flesh
fields.description: Your skin shines like burnished metal.

fields.name: Celestial Servant
fields.description: Rather than being a normal animal or beast, your companion or familiar hails from the heavenly realms.
fields.prerequisites: Aasimar, animal companion, familiar, or mount class feature.

fields.name: Channel Force
fields.description: Your channel is bolstered by your faith, allowing you to move and damage your foes.

fields.name: Greater Channel Force
fields.description: Your eruptions of divine power move your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Channel Force, Improved Channel Force, aasimar, channel energy 6d6.

fields.name: Heavenly Radiance
fields.description: Your heavenly light can be used in a variety of ways.
fields.prerequisites: Aasimar, daylight spell-like ability, sufficiently high level (see below).

fields.name: Improved Channel Force
fields.description: You move your enemies within a beam of righteous energy.

fields.name: Metallic Wings
fields.description: Your wing feathers are made of gleaming metal.
fields.prerequisites: Angelic Blood, Angelic Flesh, Angel Wings, aasimar, character level 11th.

fields.name: Black Cat
fields.description: Bad luck befalls those who dare to cross you.

fields.name: Catfolk Exemplar
fields.description: Your feline traits are more defined and prominent than those of other members of your race.

fields.name: Claw Pounce
fields.description: You can charge and make an attack with your paws.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Dex 15, Nimble Striker, base attack bonus +10, catfolk, cat's claws racial trait or Aspect of the Beast (claws of the beast manifestation).

fields.name: Feline Grace
fields.description: Your innate grace allows you to get out of the stickiest situations.

fields.name: Nimble Striker
fields.description: You were born to charge your enemies and nobody does it better.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, base attack bonus +1, catfolk, sprinter racial trait.

fields.name: Blood Drinker
fields.description: Consuming blood reinvigorates you.

fields.name: Blood Feaster
fields.description: Consuming blood gives you superhuman strength.
fields.prerequisites: Blood Drinker, base attack bonus +6, dhampir.

fields.name: Blood Salvage
fields.description: You do not need to drink blood from a living creature to gain healing benefits.

fields.name: Diverse Palate
fields.description: Your taste for blood is broader than that of other dhampirs.

fields.name: Natural Charmer
fields.description: You possess some of the dominating powers of your vampire progenitor.

fields.name: Drow Nobility
fields.description: Your blood courses with power, granting you greater spell-like abilities.
fields.prerequisites: Able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.

fields.name: Greater Drow Nobility
fields.description: You have mastered the lesser spell-like abilities of the drow, demonstrating true nobility.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Drow Nobility, Improved Drow Nobility, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.

fields.name: Improved Drow Nobility
fields.description: Your magical heritage is more potent than that of your peers, as demonstrated by your superior spell-like abilities.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Drow Nobility, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.

fields.name: Improved Umbral Scion
fields.description: You are a master of drow noble magic.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Wis 13, Drow Nobility, Greater Drow Nobility, Improved Drow Nobility, Umbral Scion, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.

fields.name: Noble Spell Resistance
fields.description: Your ascension is complete; you have the spell resistance approaching that of a demon.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Wis 13, Greater Drow Nobility, character level 13th, drow.

fields.name: Shadow Caster
fields.description: Your command over shadow and darkness create longer-lasting spell effects.

fields.name: Spider Step
fields.description: You tread where only arachnids dare.

fields.name: Spider Summoner
fields.description: You gain the ability to summon powerful spiders.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast summon monster or summon nature's ally spells, drow.

fields.name: Umbral Scion
fields.description: New spell-like abilities are unlocked for you as you rise to ascendency among the drow people.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Wis 13, Drow Nobility, Greater Drow Nobility, Improved Drow Nobility, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.

fields.name: Natural Jouster
fields.prerequisites: Centaur (or any tauric creature at the GM's discretion)

fields.name: Lastwall Phalanx
fields.description: When battling the terrifying hordes of Belkzen, you find strength in your shield brothers and sisters.

fields.name: LastwallPhalanx
fields.description: When battling the terrifying hordes of Belkzen, you find strength in your shield brothers and sisters.

fields.name: Legacy of Ozem
fields.description: Your purity is so great that the blades and bows of long-forgotten heroes sing to you as if they had been made for your righteous hands.

fields.name: Peacemaker
fields.description: Your words of peace ring true and are much more difficult for others to resist.

fields.name: Siphon Poison
fields.description: You can remove poison from afflicted creatures.

fields.name: Worldwound Walker
fields.description: Your purity always remains a blessing, even when you're surrounded by creatures that despise it.
fields.prerequisites: 5 or more Hit Dice, good alignment.

fields.name: Dark Sight
fields.description: With further modification, your eyes can pierce the gloom of even magical darkness.

fields.name: Gloom Sight
fields.description: With a combination of strange shadow magic and chirurgery, your eyes are permanently modified to see farther in darkness.

fields.name: Gloom Strike
fields.description: Few creatures are as accustomed to fighting in the shadows as you.

fields.name: Improved Dark Sight
fields.description: With further modification, your eyes see clearly in not only normal darkness, but in magical darkness as well.

fields.name: Shadow Ghost
fields.description: You can move between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane more often.

fields.name: Shadow Walker
fields.description: You can pierce the veil between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane more often, and to greater effect.

fields.name: Burn! Burn! Burn!
fields.description: You take the goblin love of arson and fire play to a whole new level.

fields.name: Fire Hand
fields.description: Born with a torch in your hand, you have a gift with anything that burns.

fields.name: Fire Tamer
fields.description: You know your way around even magical fire.

fields.name: Flame Heart
fields.description: You have mastered fire magic and alchemy.

fields.name: Goblin Gunslinger
fields.description: You have learned how to fire the big guns.

fields.name: Tangle Feet
fields.description: Creatures who cross your path find themselves tripping over their own feet.
fields.prerequisites: Dodge, Mobility, Underfoot (Advanced Player's Guide 173), goblin, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Deafening Explosion
fields.description: Your bombs explode with deafening force.

fields.name: Demoralizing Lash
fields.description: You cow your enemies with the lash of a whip.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, Intimidate 1 rank, hobgoblin.

fields.name: Focusing Blow
fields.description: You and your allies work together to shake off mental effects.

fields.name: Hobgoblin Discipline
fields.description: The presence of other hobgoblins bolsters your resolve.

fields.name: Taskmaster
fields.description: You intimidate weaker allies into reckless ferocity.

fields.name: Terrorizing Display
fields.description: Your battle prowess frightens friend and foe alike.
fields.prerequisites: Dazzling Display, Demoralizing Lash, Taskmaster, Weapon Focus, Intimidate 10 ranks, hobgoblin, proficiency with selected weapon.

fields.name: Blazing Aura
fields.description: An inferno rages inside you, causing your body to radiate intense heat.
fields.prerequisites: Inner Flame, Scorching Weapons, character level 13th, ifrit.

fields.name: Blistering Feint
fields.description: Your foes flinch from the heat of your weapon, giving you an opportunity to slip past their defenses.

fields.name: Elemental Jaunt
fields.description: The spirits of your ancestral home call to you, beckoning you to return.
fields.prerequisites: Character level 15th, ifrit, oread, sylph, or undine.

fields.name: Firesight
fields.description: Fire no longer blinds you, and smoke conceals nothing from your gaze.

fields.name: Inner Flame
fields.description: Your body generates so much heat that your mere touch scorches your enemies.

fields.name: Scorching Weapons
fields.description: Elemental fire stirs within your body, boiling your blood and rendering you resistant to flame.

fields.name: Draconic Aspect
fields.description: You possess some of the qualities of your dragon ancestors.

fields.name: Draconic Breath
fields.description: You possess draconic defenses and a draconic breath weapon.

fields.name: Draconic Glide
fields.description: You possess draconic defenses and wings that allow you to glide.

fields.name: Draconic Paragon
fields.description: You can shrug off sleep and paralysis effects as well as any dragon, and your draconic aspects improve.
fields.prerequisites: Draconic Aspect, either Draconic Breath or Draconic Glide, character level 10th, kobold.

fields.name: Kobold Ambusher
fields.description: You are adept at moving fast and staying hidden.

fields.name: Kobold Sniper
fields.description: You snipe quickly, making it harder for others to find the location of your attack.

fields.name: Tail Terror
fields.description: You have strengthened your tail enough to make slap attacks with it.

fields.name: Born Alone
fields.description: You are so tough and vicious that you killed and ate the rest of your litter while still in the womb.

fields.name: Bullying Blow
fields.description: With a simple hit, you more easily intimidate an opponent.

fields.name: Ferocious Action
fields.description: You ferocity is quick but shorter lived.

fields.name: Foment the Blood
fields.description: You can unleash a wave of energy that drives orcs into a frenzy.

fields.name: Grudge Fighter
fields.description: You feel great anger at anyone who dares to attack you, and this fury makes your own attacks that much stronger.

fields.name: Orc Weapon Expertise
fields.description: You can do more with the weapons orcs favor the most.

fields.name: Resolute Rager
fields.description: Fear passes quickly while you are raging.

fields.name: Reverse-Feint
fields.description: You can goad an opponent into attacking you in order to make your counter attack all the more powerful.

fields.name: Trap Wrecker
fields.description: You can smash traps instead of disarming them.
fields.prerequisites: Power Attack, Disable Device 1 rank, orc.

fields.name: Dwarf Blooded
fields.description: You have dwarven blood coursing through your veins.

fields.name: Echoes of Stone
fields.description: Your senses are keener among the rocks and stones.

fields.name: Murmurs of Earth
fields.description: The earth opens up her secrets to your perceptions.
fields.prerequisites: Echoes of Stone, character level 9th, oread.

fields.name: Oread Burrower
fields.description: The ground parts for you at the slightest touch, allowing you to dig with great speed.

fields.name: Oread Earth Glider
fields.description: The earth welcomes you, showing you the secret paths through sand and soil.
fields.prerequisites: Oread Burrower, Stony Step, character level 13th, oread.

fields.name: Stony Step
fields.description: The earth recognizes its kinship with you and does not impede your movement.

fields.name: Burrowing Teeth
fields.description: You have teeth and claws that suit you well to digging.

fields.name: Sharpclaw
fields.description: Your nails are large and strong.

fields.name: Tunnel Rat
fields.description: You are a master of fighting in confined spaces.

fields.name: Airy Step
fields.description: The air responds to your innate elemental nature, protecting you from harm and cushioning your falls.

fields.name: Cloud Gazer
fields.description: Your insight into your elemental heritage gives you a clarity of sight few humans possess.

fields.name: Inner Breath
fields.description: Your body is suffused with elemental air that provides for all your respiratory needs.

fields.name: Wings of Air
fields.description: The winds lift you, carrying you where you want to go.

fields.name: Blood Beak
fields.description: Your bleed attack is bloody and dangerous.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, natural weapon racial trait, tengu.

fields.name: Carrion Feeder
fields.description: Like many scavengers, you can stomach foods that would make weaker creatures ill.

fields.name: Long-Nose Form
fields.description: You can shift into the form of a human with an unusually long nose.

fields.name: Scavenger's Eye
fields.description: Your gaze is naturally drawn to valuable glittering objects.

fields.name: Tengu Raven Form
fields.description: You can shift into the form of a giant black raven.

fields.name: Tengu Wings
fields.description: You can grow wings that allow you to fly.

fields.name: Armor of the Pit
fields.description: Your fiendish traits take the form of a protective scaly skin.

fields.name: Expanded Fiendish Resistance
fields.description: You gain extra fiendish resistances.

fields.name: Fiend Sight
fields.description: Your eyes develop keener sight in dim light and darkness.

fields.name: Grasping Tail
fields.description: Your tail becomes more useful.

fields.name: Aquatic Ancestry
fields.description: You favor your outsider ancestry and are better adapted to life in the water.

fields.name: Hydraulic Maneuver
fields.description: You can use your hydraulic push to disarm or trip.

fields.name: Steam Caster
fields.description: You imbue your fire spells with elemental water, transforming them into powerful gouts of steam.

fields.name: Triton Portal
fields.description: You can channel your inner magic to summon allies.
fields.prerequisites: Character level 5th, hydraulic push spell-like ability, undine.

fields.name: Water Skinned
fields.description: Your touch extinguishes small flames.

fields.name: Mother's Gift
fields.description: You inherit a special boon from your hag parent.

fields.name: Giant Steps
fields.description: When enlarged, your speed increases.
fields.prerequisites: Duergar, slow and steady racial trait.

fields.name: Lingering Invisibility
fields.description: You remain brief ly translucent after losing invisibility.

fields.name: Agile Tongue
fields.description: Your long pink tongue is capable of manipulating small items and even stealing objects.

fields.name: Magical Tail
fields.description: You grow an extra tail that represents your growing magical powers.

fields.name: Realistic Likeness
fields.description: When you are in human form, you can take the shape of a specific individual.

fields.name: Sea Hunter
fields.description: Your blows knock swimming opponents off balance.

fields.name: Spit Venom
fields.description: You have mastered the nagaji warrior technique of spitting venom into your opponent's eyes.

fields.name: Life's Blood
fields.description: Your blood flows with eternal life, and its healing powers allow you use your blood to heal others.

fields.name: Stretched Wings
fields.description: You strengthen your crippled wings.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Skill Focus (Fly), strix, wing-clipped racial trait.

fields.name: Extra Elemental Assault
fields.description: You have unlocked greater elemental power.

fields.name: Incremental Elemental Assault
fields.description: You may activate and quench your elemental assault ability multiple times per day.

fields.name: Stoic Pose
fields.description: You can hold yourself as still as a statue, evading detection.

fields.name: Tree Hanger
fields.description: You can use your tail to defend against trip attacks and to hang from nearby protrusions.

fields.name: Sleep Venom
fields.description: You can change the nature of your toxic spittle to put your enemies to sleep.

fields.name: Shadowy Dash
fields.description: In dim light, you resemble little more than a shadow.

fields.name: Belier's Bite
fields.description: Your unarmed strikes cause your opponent to bleed.

fields.name: Cornugon Shield
fields.description: You can use your spiked chain as both armor and weapon.

fields.name: Cornugon Smash
fields.description: Your terrible attacks strike fear into your enemies.

fields.name: Cornugon Stun
fields.description: You are able to make stunning attacks with special monk weapons.

fields.name: Cornugon Trip
fields.description: You can throw your spiked chain to make trip attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Improved Trip, Weapon Focus (spiked chain).

fields.name: Fury's Fall
fields.description: You can use strength and agility to send foes crashing to the ground.

fields.name: Fury's Snare
fields.description: You entangle your foe in your weapon.

fields.name: Hamatula Grasp
fields.description: You deal terrible damage to impaled foes.
fields.prerequisites: Hamatula Strike, Improved Grapple, Strength 13, base attack bonus +9.

fields.name: Hamatula Strike
fields.description: You can catch your opponents on your weapon and hold them in place.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Strength 13, Base Attack Bonus +7.

fields.name: Hellcat Pounce
fields.description: You attack unsuspecting foes twice.
fields.prerequisites: Hellcat Stealth, Skill Focus (Stealth), sneak attack +2d6.

fields.name: Hellcat Stealth
fields.description: You are difficult to see in the light.

fields.name: Osyluth Guile
fields.description: You are skilled at misdirecting an opponent's attacks.

fields.name: Bounding Hammer
fields.description: You can throw a hammer so it rebounds near you.
fields.prerequisites: Proficiency with hammer, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Darting Viper
fields.description: When using a dorn-dergar, you can quickly attack both near and distant foes.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +4, proficiency with the dwarven dorn-dergar.

fields.name: Dorn-Dergar Master
fields.description: You can use a dorn-dergar with only one hand.
fields.prerequisites: Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +4, proficiency with the dwarven dorn-dergar.

fields.name: Sliding Axe Throw
fields.description: You may aim your thrown axe to avoid an enemy's shield and even trip your opponent.

fields.name: Stance of the Xorn
fields.description: You have heightened awareness of enemies on all sides.

fields.name: Arcane School Spirit
fields.description: You can talk up the power of your own school of magic to such an extent that creatures find it more difficult to resist your spells.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, arcane school class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Bewildering Koan
fields.description: You can pose unanswerable questions that leave creatures momentarily dumbfounded as they dwell on their significance.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, ki pool class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Blood Ties
fields.description: Pointing out your shared kinship with someone gives you the chance to win over creatures associated with your bloodline.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, bloodline class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Babble-Peddler
fields.description: Your talent for flimflam allows you to trick creatures into exchanging valuable objects for whatever junk you happen to offer.

fields.name: Caustic Slur
fields.description: You know exactly how to insult your favored enemies in order to make them lose their heads.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, favored enemy class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Helpless Prisoner
fields.description: You can talk your way out of most restraints.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 5 ranks, Escape Artist 1 rank, gnome.

fields.name: Invoke Primal Instinct
fields.description: You can use your ability to take the shape of an animal to enhance your Bluff skill, giving yourself an aura of danger or meekness that influences nearby creatures into doing what you want.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, wild shape class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Tantrum
fields.description: Your crying, sputtering, and even frothing at the mouth makes you so laughably incoherent that opponents are apt to dismiss you as a threat.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, rage class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Witty Feint
fields.description: Your blending of conversation and martial prowess makes it difficult for opponents to slip past your guard.
fields.prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, weapon training class feature, gnome.

fields.name: Mounted Blade
fields.description: You have learned to use the momentum of your mount to carry your weapon through one foe and into another.
fields.prerequisites: Ride 3 ranks, Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, base attack bonus +1, Qadira affinity

fields.name: Elephant Stomp
fields.description: You deliver a crushing blow to downed enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, Improved Overrun, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Jaguar Pounce
fields.description: Your ambushes are especially lethal.

fields.name: Monkey Lunge
fields.description: You can quickly recover from your lunges, helping you to avoid counterattacks.

fields.name: Piranha Strike
fields.description: You make a combination of quick strikes, sacrificing accuracy for multiple, minor wounds that prove exceptionally deadly.

fields.name: Rhino Charge
fields.description: Your charges are both violent and unpredictable.
fields.prerequisites: Power Attack, Improved Bull Rush, base attack bonus +5.

fields.name: Boon Companion
fields.description: Your bond with your animal companion or familiar is unusually close.
fields.prerequisites: Animal companion or familiar class feature.

fields.name: Critical Conduit
fields.description: You are deadly when delivering your master's magic.

fields.name: Extra Item Slot
fields.description: You are able to wear magic items more easily than other creatures of your kind.

fields.name: Familiar Focus
fields.description: You are closely connected to your master's powers.

fields.name: Familiar Spell
fields.description: You can imbue your familiar with a spell.

fields.name: Jumper
fields.description: You are a natural leaper.
fields.prerequisites: Acrobatics 1 rank, creature type other than humanoid or outsider.

fields.name: Lithe Attacker
fields.description: Your unmatched grace allows you to strike even from the tightest crevices.
fields.prerequisites: Narrow Frame, Escape Artist 5 ranks, animal or magical beast.

fields.name: Master ofYour Kind
fields.description: When you speak to other animals of your kind, you can influence them to act according to your wishes and those of your master.
fields.prerequisites: Familiar, speak with animals of its kind ability.

fields.name: Narrow Frame
fields.description: Your excellent coordination allows you to maneuver better in close quarters.
fields.prerequisites: Escape Artist 1 rank, animal or magical beast.

fields.name: Spell Sponge
fields.description: Your mystical connection with your spellcasting master attunes you to helpful magical effects.
fields.prerequisites: Animal companion or familiar, share spells ability.

fields.name: Stable Gallop
fields.description: You run with a smooth and steady gait.

fields.name: Sure-Footed
fields.description: Your footing is secure in unstable terrain.

fields.name: Valiant Steed
fields.description: Your courage is unnaturally strong.

fields.name: Archon Diversion
fields.description: You are able to throw yourself in front of danger to protect your friends.
fields.prerequisites: Archon Style, Combat Expertise, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +4 or monk level 4th.

fields.name: Archon Justice
fields.description: Your righteous indignation knows no bounds, and foes that attack your companions soon learn the error of their foolish ways.
fields.prerequisites: Archon Diversion, Archon Style, Combat Expertise, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.

fields.name: Archon Style
fields.description: You have trained thoroughly to protect your allies from harm, even if it means temporarily sacrificing your own safety in the process.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +2 or monk level 2nd.

fields.name: Banishing Critical
fields.description: With your combination of combat and spellcasting prowess, you send otherworldly monsters back to their place of origin.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, ability to cast dismissal or banishment, caster level 9th.

fields.name: Blinding Light
fields.description: You use your impenetrable luminescence to disorient harbingers of darkness.
fields.prerequisites: Inner Light, aasimar, daylight spell-like ability.

fields.name: Consecrate Spell
fields.description: You infuse spells with heavenly power, drastically increasing their effectiveness against would-be heralds of evil.
fields.prerequisites: Aasimar, able to prepare or cast consecrate.

fields.name: Inner Light
fields.description: Even when your innate powers over light fail you, you and your allies prove vigilant against dark forces, fighting until the end.

fields.name: Revered Guidance
fields.description: You were selected by your celestial ancestor to be a guide for a chosen people, and serve as a beacon of hope in times of despair.
fields.prerequisites: Aasimar, must be taken at 1st level.

fields.name: Sunlit Strike
fields.description: Your melee blows deal extra damage to creatures sensitive to light, making you adept at hunting foul monsters of the night.
fields.prerequisites: Arcane Strike, able to prepare or cast sunlight.

fields.name: Supernal Feast
fields.description: You sup on the blood of your ancestors to fuel your fury.

fields.name: Ancestral Scorn
fields.description: The fury you harbor for your fiendish ancestors gives evil outsiders great reason to fear you.

fields.name: Banner of Doom
fields.description: The mere sight of your fiendish banner is enough to send ripples of fear through your enemies.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +8, banner class feature, tiefling.

fields.name: Blinding Sneak Attack
fields.description: When you strike from the cover of darkness, you inject foes with a fraction of your foul magic.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, darkness spell-like ability, sneak attack class feature, tiefling.

fields.name: Fiendish Darkness
fields.description: You can use your darkness spell-like ability more often.

fields.name: Fiendish Facade
fields.description: You are easily mistaken for a member of another race. Your fiendish physical traits are normally hidden by clothing or appear to be markings of another race.
fields.prerequisites: Must be taken at 1st level, tiefling.

fields.name: Fiendish Resilience
fields.description: You dodge energy attacks with amazing agility.

fields.name: Fury of the Tainted
fields.description: The unstoppable anger you feel toward do-gooders and self-proclaimed saints makes you a force to be reckoned with.

fields.name: Improved Fiendish Darkness
fields.description: Your innate ability to shroud others in darkness is further empowered.
fields.prerequisites: Fiendish Darkness, darkness spell-like ability, caster level 3rd, tiefling.

fields.name: Improved Fiendish Sorcery
fields.description: Your skill with foul sorcery is even more potent than that of others of your race.

fields.name: Improved Fury of the Tainted
fields.description: Your hatred for goodness is rivaled only by your ability to repel it.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Fury of the Tainted, base attack bonus +8, rage class feature, tiefling.

fields.name: Monstrous Mask
fields.description: Your fiendish physical traits give you a twisted and fearsome appearance that strikes fear into others' hearts.
fields.prerequisites: Tiefling, must be taken at 1st level.

fields.name: Terrifying Mask
fields.description: Your fiendish visage has made you a truly terrifying spectacle to behold, and you can force others to betray their feelings with a single look.

fields.name: Wicked Valor
fields.description: The fiendish blood that courses through your body causes your wounds to heal faster than usual.

fields.name: Reckless Aim
fields.description: Your lack of regard for others proves a boon when you fire projectiles into melee.

fields.name: Conviction
fields.description: Your actions are bolstered by divine determination.

fields.name: Hymn Singer
fields.description: Your music is infused with your faith.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance, good alignment, worshiper of a good deity.

fields.name: Life-Dominant Soul
fields.description: You gain unusual resiliency from your mortal heritage.

fields.name: Potent HolySymbol
fields.description: In your pious hands, your holy symbol is a shining light of faith.
fields.prerequisites: Good alignment, worshiper of a good deity.

fields.name: SchooledResolve
fields.description: Your intensive combat training to fight vampiric forces allows you to fight off their mental spells and effects using your resistance to fear.

fields.name: Aversion Tolerance
fields.description: You have been hunted for so long that you have developed resistances to slayers' usual scare tactics.

fields.name: Famine Tolerance
fields.description: You can abide much longer periods without feeding, and enjoy increased benefits from a meal.

fields.name: VampiricCompanion
fields.description: Just as your undead existence mocks nature, so too are you granted a twisted companion that reflects the vile nature of vampirism.
fields.prerequisites: Dhampir or vampire, nongood alignment, 10 levels in a class that grants a familiar or animal companion.

fields.name: Variant Prayer Scroll
fields.description: You have learned the secret to changing the powers granted by your prayer scroll.

fields.name: Blinding Flash
fields.description: You can temporarily blind your opponent by using your weapon or shield to flash sunlight into its eyes.
