fields.name: Disorienting Blow
fields.description: When you successfully strike your opponent with your Stunning Fist, you leave it in a state of confusion.

fields.name: Enhanced Ki Throw
fields.description: You enhance the force of your ki throws, enabling you to devastate your opponents as you slam them to the ground.
fields.prerequisites: Ki pool class feature, Ki Throw (see the Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player's Guide).

fields.name: Feinting Flurry
fields.description: Your subtle flourishes mislead your enemy, tricking it into changing its footing.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, flurry of blows class feature, Combat Expertise.

fields.name: Hold the Blade
fields.description: You can take your opponent's weapon after being stabbed in the back.

fields.name: Improved Feinting Flurry
fields.description: Your first melee attack throws your opponent completely off guard.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 17, flurry of blows class feature, Combat Expertise, Feinting Flurry, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Quivering Palm Adept
fields.description: Your quivering palm strikes are more potent than most.

fields.name: Quivering Palm Versatility
fields.description: You can alter the way you apply a quivering palm's vibrations to an opponent's body to cause extreme pain, put it in a coma, or destroy its memories.
fields.prerequisites: Quivering palm class feature, base attack bonus +13.

fields.name: Sleeper Hold
fields.description: By maintaining a grapple hold on your opponent, you can cause it to lose consciousness.

fields.name: Stunning Fist Adept
fields.description: Your Stunning Fist strikes become even deadlier.

fields.name: Arcane Trap Suppressor
fields.description: Your magic can suppress magic traps longer than usual.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast dispel magic or greater dispel magic as a spell or spell-like ability.

fields.name: Close Call
fields.description: Your nimble fingers are able to catch small slips before they become big disasters.

fields.name: Tactical Reposition
fields.description: You excel at moving foes right where you want them.

fields.name: Coaxing Spell
fields.description: Your charms and enchantments reach the minds of even the lowliest dungeon denizens.

fields.name: Dampen Presence
fields.description: Your habitual stillness makes you difficult to perceive for creatures that use blindsight or blindsense.

fields.name: Cursed Item Detection
fields.description: Your arcane prowess is so great that even cursed items fail to befuddle you.
fields.prerequisites: Spellcraft 5 ranks, ability to cast detect magic as a spell or spell-like ability.

fields.name: Ostentatious Display
fields.description: Your extravagant jewelry and accessories give you an air of importance you can use to your advantage in many social situations.

fields.name: TORCH HANDLING
fields.description: In your grasp, a simple torch becomes a beacon.

fields.name: Arcane Insight
fields.description: Magical insight helps you evade attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Worshiper of Nethys, Arcane Shield (see the Advanced Player's Guide).

fields.name: Bloody Vengeance
fields.description: Your retaliatory strikes have long-lasting effects.
fields.prerequisites: Worshiper of Calistria, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Measured Response
fields.description: You believe that a conservative but consistent response guarantees success.
fields.prerequisites: Worshiper of Abadar, base attack bonus +1.

fields.name: Riptide Attack
fields.description: You can follow up a successful trip attempt with a drag maneuver.
fields.prerequisites: Worshiper of Gozreh, Improved Drag, Improved Trip.

fields.name: Spiked Destroyer
fields.description: You can attack with your armor spikes while using bull rush or overrun.
fields.prerequisites: Worshiper of Gorum, proficient in spiked armor.

fields.name: Steady Engagement
fields.description: You can draw on your excellent balance to trip or disarm opponents when they try to disengage.
fields.prerequisites: Worshiper of Irori, Combat Reflexes, Stand Still.

fields.name: Firebrand
fields.description: You can make use of a torch as a deadly, macelike weapon.

fields.name: Ordered Mind
fields.description: Your study of Hell's laws improves your counterspells.
fields.prerequisites: Caster level 7th, lawful alignment, worshiper of Asmodeus.

fields.name: Destroy Identity
fields.description: You are able to use your weapons to destroy some of your opponent's most distinctive physical characteristics.
fields.prerequisites: Critical Focus, base attack bonus +11, worshiper of Lamashtu.

fields.name: Fearsome Finish
fields.description: When you slay enemies, you frighten other opponents.

fields.name: Reject Poison
fields.description: You are a careful poisoner, and know how to protect yourself against exposure to the ill effects of most substances.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, poison use class feature, worshiper of Norgorber.

fields.name: Shadow Dodge
fields.description: You use light and darkness to your advantage, confusing your enemies and confounding their senses.

fields.name: Merciless Rush
fields.description: You are a determined foe, and though hordes may stand against you, they will not stand long.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Bull Rush, worshiper of Rovagug.

fields.name: Squash Flat
fields.description: You are able to bull rush an opponent straight to the ground.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Bull Rush, Merciless Rush, worshiper of Rovagug.

fields.name: Shatter Resolve
fields.description: Damaging a foe with negative energy causes despair.
fields.prerequisites: Channel negative energy class feature, worshiper of Urgathoa.

fields.name: Bloodletting
fields.description: When you attack with a piercing or slashing weapon, the wounds you cause bleed profusely.

fields.name: Aldori Dueling Mastery
fields.description: You have mastered the grueling fighting style perfected by the Aldori Swordlords.
fields.prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Aldori dueling sword), Quick Draw, Weapon Finesse, Weapon Focus (Aldori dueling sword).

fields.name: Altitude Affinity
fields.description: You have hardened your body against the grueling rigors of surviving at high altitudes.

fields.name: Andoren Falconry
fields.description: You know the secret Andoren arts of falconry developed by the Novotnian family of Darkmoon Vale.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Animal Affinity, animal companion class feature.

fields.name: Arcane Vendetta
fields.description: The mistreatment of your people by an arcane society (such as Numeria's Technic League or the White Witches of Irrisen) has made you particularly eager to inf lict harm on those who use arcane magic.

fields.name: Careful Speaker
fields.description: The paranoid terror that comes from living in a region with a dangerous government (such as Cheliax or Galt) has made you unusually aware of what you say.

fields.name: Cypher Magic
fields.description: Your intimacy with runes and the mysteries of ancient arcana has taught you secret ways to draw greater power from magical writings. These unusual methods were initially devised by the Cyphermages of Riddleport, but they have since spread far and wide through the Inner Sea region.

fields.name: Cypher Script
fields.description: Through researching lengthy, ancient, arcane scripts, you have discovered a more efficient method of recording spells. As with the Cypher Magic feat, Cypher Script was originally developed by the Cyphermages of Riddleport, but has been spreading through the Inner Sea region recently.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (arcana) 1 rank, Linguistics 1 rank, Spellcraft 1 rank, spellbook class feature.

fields.name: Demon Hunter
fields.description: You are well-versed in demonic lore.

fields.name: Dervish Dance
fields.description: You have learned to turn your speed into power, even with a heavier blade.
fields.prerequisites: Dexterity 13, Weapon Finesse, Perform (dance) 2 ranks, proficient with scimitar.

fields.name: Desert Dweller
fields.description: Your time spent living in merciless deserts has granted you resistance to extreme heat, starvation, and thirst.

fields.name: Desperate Battler
fields.description: Your experiences fighting against numerous foes that have already overwhelmed your allies, friends, and family have forced you to excel at fighting on your own.

fields.name: Eye of the Arclord
fields.description: Your understanding of the esoteric teachings of the Arclords of Nex allows you to open an eldritch eye that grants you superior perception of the magical world.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, ability to cast arcane spells.

fields.name: Fey Foundling
fields.description: You were found in the wilds as a child, bearing a mark of the First World.
fields.prerequisites: You may only select this feat at 1st level.

fields.name: Flagbearer
fields.description: When brandishing a flag adorned with the standard of an organization you owe allegiance to, you inspire nearby members of the same allegiance.

fields.name: Focused Discipline
fields.description: Familiarity with the military traditions of your homeland inspires uncommon valor in you.

fields.name: Fortune Teller
fields.description: As a result of being raised in a land steeped in tradition and superstition (such as Varisia or Ustalav), you are skilled at communicating with the spirit world.

fields.name: Free Spirit
fields.description: Your strong belief in the value of freedom protects you from mental and physical shackles.

fields.name: Godless Healing
fields.description: You have mastered a specialized and complex technique to ignore pain by focusing your belief on the self rather than relying on faith.

fields.name: Green Faith Acolyte
fields.description: You have trained to channel your magical energies in ways that do not harm the natural world around you.

fields.name: Hamatulatsu
fields.description: You have mastered a deadly fighting form inspired by the hideous attacks of the barbed devil.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Weapon Focus (unarmed strike).

fields.name: Harmonic Spell
fields.description: You can weave bardic music effects into your spellcasting in such a way that your spellcasting and bardic performance become indistinguishable.

fields.name: Harrowed
fields.description: Numerous Harrow readings early in your life seem to have hit the mark precisely, increasing your belief that you are destined for a specific purpose in life.

fields.name: Hermean Blood
fields.description: You are the descendant of someone recruited to Hermea or the bastard result of a Hermean's illicit pairing with someone foreign to that land.
fields.prerequisites: You may only gain this feat at 1st level.

fields.name: Necromantic Affinity
fields.description: Long exposure to necromantic energies has granted you a small measure of resistance against them.

fields.name: Noble Scion
fields.description: You are a member of a proud noble family, whether or not you remain in good standing with your family.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, must be taken at 1st level.

fields.name: Rapid Reload
fields.description: Choose a type of crossbow (hand, light, heavy) or a single type of one-handed or two-handed firearm that you are proficient with. You can reload such a weapon quickly.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency (crossbow type chosen) or Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearm).

fields.name: Rugged Northerner
fields.description: You live a hard life in a cold climate and gain some benefit from it.

fields.name: Scholar
fields.description: You have graduated from one of the many colleges, universities, and specialty schools of higher learning scattered throughout the Inner Sea region.

fields.name: Secret Signs
fields.description: You are particularly adept at communicating with others via innuendo, gestures, and secret hand signs.

fields.name: Shade of the Uskwood
fields.description: Ordained as one of the sinister albino druids who dwell within the heart of the Uskwood, you carry with you into the wider world a powerful effigy of hair, twigs, and blood that crawls with the deepening cold of the Midnight Lord's hallowed hunting grounds.

fields.name: Shrewd Tactician
fields.description: Your dealings with pirates, thieves, and assassins have taught you to be exceedingly careful.

fields.name: Stoic
fields.description: You know from firsthand experience that life is a series of unforgiving trials, and that fear itself is something that can be conquered.

fields.name: Storm-Lashed
fields.description: A life spent enduring gales and storms has hardened your body to the elements.

fields.name: Survivor
fields.description: Only the strong thrive in your homeland, and you are no weakling, even among your kin.

fields.name: Taldan Duelist
fields.description: You trained at one of Taldor's elite fighting schools and are skilled at rondelero, the art of fighting with the falcata (see the Advanced Player's Guide) and buckler.
fields.prerequisites: Dex 13, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (falcata), Shield Proficiency (buckler), Weapon Focus (falcata).

fields.name: Totem Spirit
fields.description: You are mystically tied to your tribe's sacred totem.

fields.name: Varisian Tattoo
fields.description: You bear intricate tattoos that inspire and empower your natural magic ability. These tattoos mark you as a worker of the ancient traditions of Varisian magic. A Varisian tattoo typically consists of a long string of complex characters from the Thassilonian alphabet.

fields.name: Wand Dancer
fields.description: You are trained in a tradition of Garundi courtesans and court mages that melds dance with the use of magic wands.

fields.name: Slaying Sprint
fields.description: With swift feet and deadly intent, you finish off your target before anyone sees your blade.
fields.prerequisites: Dodge, Mobility, Spring Attack, base attack bonus +13

fields.name: Greater Serpent Lash
fields.description: Your ability to disarm and pull foes off balance with your whip is impressive.

fields.name: Serpent Lash
fields.description: You are adept at vexing multiple foes with your whip.

fields.name: Circling Offense
fields.description: You are skilled at approaching large foes with an ally in a way that makes it difficult for your foes to find an advantage against you or your ally.

fields.name: Footslasher
fields.description: You are trained to strike at a large foe's feet to impede its movement and cause great pain.

fields.name: Topple Foe
fields.description: You and your allies can work together to trip larger foes.

fields.name: Jackal Heritage
fields.description: A jackalwere crouches somewhere in your family tree.
fields.prerequisites: Humanoid, must be taken at 1st level.

fields.name: Drunken Brawler
fields.description: You have learned how to fight effectively while drunk.

fields.name: Butterfly's Sting
fields.description: You can forgo a critical hit in order to pass it on to an ally.

fields.name: Divination Guide
fields.description: Consulting the agents of your deity, you gain more guidance than most would.
fields.prerequisites: The ability to cast augury or divination, caster level 3rd.

fields.name: Bullseye Shot
fields.description: You slow your breath, calm yourself, and hit the bullseye, just as you were trained to.
fields.prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +5.

fields.name: Nimble Natural Summons
fields.description: Your summoned natural allies ignore difficult terrain in undergrowth.
fields.prerequisites: Augmented Summoning, Spell Focus (conjuration), caster level 6th.

fields.name: Charge of the Righteous
fields.description: You charge undead and fiends with confidence in your righteous cause.

fields.name: Protector's Strike
fields.description: When you smite evil, your divine power protects a creature within line of sight.
fields.prerequisites: Smite evil class feature, base attack bonus +5.

fields.name: Bestow Hope
fields.description: Upon healing a creature with positive energy, you also give it hope.
fields.prerequisites: Channel positive energy class feature, Improved Channel.

fields.name: Glorious Heat
fields.description: When you cast divine fire spells, their heat empowers nearby allies.
fields.prerequisites: ability to cast divine spells, caster level 5th.

fields.name: Spear Dancer
fields.description: You incorporate a two-handed reach weapon into a dizzying martial dance.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus (any twohanded reach weapon), Perform 4 ranks.

fields.name: Stone Read
fields.description: Even the faint movement and vibrations of stone can alert you to trouble.

fields.name: Undermining Exploit
fields.description: Your familiarity with earth and stone gives you a distinct advantage on rocky battlefields.

fields.name: Ankle Biter
fields.description: You know how take a mouthful out of anyone who tries to overpower you.

fields.name: Battle Singer
fields.description: Your battle songs can drive your fellow goblins to new heights of frenzy.

fields.name: Dog Killer, Horse Hunter
fields.description: Embracing fear and hatred of your ancestral foes allows you to make particularly telling blows.

fields.name: Lead from the Back
fields.description: You allies depend far too much on your leadership and encouraging words for you to actually put yourself in harms' way.

fields.name: Letter Fury
fields.description: You go wild when someone tries to steal the words from your head.

fields.name: Roll With It
fields.description: You know how to take a hit, even if your reaction sends you bouncing and flying out of battle while shrieking at the top of your lungs.

fields.name: Saddle Shrieker
fields.description: You sometimes get carried away when encouraging your mount to fight.

fields.name: Combat Distraction
fields.description: Anyone who attacks you while you act like a lunatic exposes themselves to brutal counterattacks from your allies.
fields.prerequisites: Goblin, Acrobatics 1 rank, Escape Artist 1 rank.

fields.name: Vandal
fields.description: Even other goblins admire your talent for mindless destruction.

fields.name: Ammo Drop
fields.description: Your coordination is so perfect that you can simply drop ammunition from your hand at the exact moment required for it to fall into an open sling as your twirl it around.
fields.prerequisites: Sleight of Hand 1 rank, proficient with sling.

fields.name: Halfling Slinger
fields.description: You have honed your racial talent for slingcraft.

fields.name: Juggle Load
fields.description: Your fingers are so nimble that reloading your sling is almost effortless for you.
fields.prerequisites: Ammo Drop, Sleight of Hand 1 rank, proficient with sling.

fields.name: Large Target
fields.description: The larger a creature is, the easier you find it to strike a vulnerable spot when attacking with a sling.

fields.name: Whip-Slinger
fields.description: You can use your sling as a sap to make attacks of opportunity.

fields.name: Amplified Rage
fields.description: When adjacent to other raging allies, your rages become even more powerful.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Blood Vengeance
fields.description: Seeing an ally fall in combat fills you with a murderous fury.

fields.name: Brutal Grappler
fields.description: When helping an ally grapple, you can damage the target.

fields.name: Destroyer's Blessing
fields.description: Breaking things adds to your power.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature, worshiper of the Destroyer.

fields.name: Ferocious Tenacity
fields.description: You spit in the face of death.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, ferocity racial trait, rage class feature.

fields.name: Ferocious Tenacity
fields.description: You spit in the face of death.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, ferocity racial trait, rage class feature.

fields.name: Fire God's Blessing
fields.description: The Fire God rewards you for killing enemies with flame.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, worshiper of the Fire God.

fields.name: Gore Fiend
fields.description: Horrible wounds, whether on yourself or your enemies, makes your blood sing.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Sympathetic Rage
fields.description: Seeing an ally enter a rage causes you to enter a rage-like state.

fields.name: Thrill of the Kill
fields.description: Killing fuels your rage.
fields.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

fields.name: Warleader's Rage
fields.description: Your rages are so inspiring to your allies that they don't have to remain adjacent to you to stay raging.

fields.name: Adept Channel
fields.description: Some orc adepts enjoy a greater connection to their gods, and can channel their faith through their unholy symbols. You gain the ability to channel energy as a cleric.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast divine spells, summon familiar class ability, caster level 4th, Cha 13.

fields.name: Cold Celerity
fields.description: You are a child of the frozen north, and you draw your strength from the biting cold and unforgiving conditions.

fields.name: Tribal Scars
fields.description: You endured the grueling coming-of-age rituals of your tribe or following, and proudly bear the scars that grant you the blessings of your tribe's ancestors or totem.
fields.prerequisites: Member of a Mammoth Lords tribe or following.

fields.name: Witchbreaker
fields.description: Your training and skill in combating witches and hags have made you resistant to their magic, and you can disrupt their magical hatred.

fields.name: DEADLY DEALER
fields.description: Your skill with handling cards and arcane talents allow you to turn mundane cards into deadly weapons.
fields.prerequisites: Arcane Strike, Sleight of Hand 5 ranks.

fields.name: Thunder And Fang
fields.description: You have mastered the ancient Shoanti Thunder and Fang fighting style, allowing you to fight with increased effectiveness when wielding an earth breaker and klar.
fields.prerequisites: Str 15, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Focus (earth breaker), Weapon Focus (klar)

fields.name: Chainbreaker
fields.description: Nothing rouses your fury and makes you more deadly in battle than the sight of slaves cowering before their masters.
fields.prerequisites: Over the course of at least five different occasions, free a cumulative total of 50+ sentient beings held in unjust captivity.

fields.name: Devil's Foe
fields.description: Once you were just another helpless victim, but now even the deepest pits of Hell ring with the lamentations of your adversaries.
fields.prerequisites: Face 10 different devils in combat and take damage or suffer some other sort of injury from five or more attacks made by each one without falling unconscious, fleeing, or otherwise becoming unable to strike back at them.

fields.name: Eagle Knight Candidate
fields.description: You have proven your courage and skill to both the Eagle Knights and the leaders of Andoran.
fields.prerequisites: Character level 5th, convince four different Eagle Knights and either a member of the People's Council or an Andoran town mayor to write letters of commendation on your behalf.

fields.name: Talmandor's Lifting
fields.description: You felt the powerful wings of Talmandor surround you when you risked death from a fall, and somehow a tiny spark of his essence remains connected to your soul.
fields.prerequisites: Take at least 10d6 falling damage on three different occasions and survive.

fields.name: Advanced Defensive Combat Training
fields.description: You are a master at defending yourself from all manner of combat maneuvers.
fields.prerequisites: Defensive Combat Training, Bellf lower Network 10 TPA.

fields.name: Bloodstone Manhunter
fields.description: You are skilled at fighting criminal humans such as bandits.

fields.name: Calm Disposition
fields.description: You always appear to be in control of your situation.

fields.name: Death's Suitor
fields.description: You have died and returned so often that even Pharasma now deems it part of your fate.

fields.name: Disassemble Magic Item
fields.description: You can take apart and reassemble magic items.
fields.prerequisites: Any item creation feat, Aspis Consortium 20 TPA.

fields.name: Divine Deception
fields.description: You are skilled at manipulating divine magical items.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (religion) 5 ranks, Use Magic Device 5 ranks.

fields.name: Fast Crawl
fields.description: You are skilled at moving while prone.

fields.name: Fearsome Barricade
fields.description: Your wrath is as potent a barrier as your blades.

fields.name: Grand Master Performer
fields.description: You grant your allies even greater bonuses when using your bardic performance abilities.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Master Performer, bard level 8th, Kitharodian Academy 20 TPA.

fields.name: Ki Diversity
fields.description: You have trained at the feet of the masters of the Kusari- Gama, a secret society of monk warriors. With their secrets you have mastered new ways to apply your ki.
fields.prerequisites: Ki pool class feature, Wis 13, Kusari-Gama 25 TPA.

fields.name: Let Them Come
fields.description: You have trained to fight onrushing enemy hordes. With a carefully timed strike you ensure that their reckless charge will be their undoing.

fields.name: Master Performer
fields.description: When using your bardic performance abilities, you grant your allies greater bonuses.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Kitharodian Academy 15 TPA.

fields.name: Nameless Servitor
fields.description: The fact that you have given up your real name makes you resistant to certain types of magic.
fields.prerequisites: Risen Guard rank, Risen Guard 10 TPA.

fields.name: Old Cults Awakener
fields.description: You hear the voices of the Old Ones, and believe it is your destiny to awaken others to their ancient cause using bizarre and torturous rituals. Whether your work leaves these individuals mad or truly touched by alien sentience remains unproven.

fields.name: Ominous Mien
fields.description: Your walk, stance, and voice all amplify your status as a Hellknight when you cast spells or use spell-like abilities against opponents.

fields.name: Silent Performer
fields.description: You can use any bardic performance ability without making a sound.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Master Performer, bard level 12th, Kitharodian Academy 15 TPA.

fields.name: Touched By Sacred Fire
fields.description: Regular contact with an elemental guardian of the Ruby Prince (such as Khemet's invisible fire elemental cohort Janhelia) has left you able to shrug off many sources of unnatural heat, even if the effort required sometimes makes it difficult to defend yourself from attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Endurance, Risen Guard rank, Risen Guard 15 TPA.

fields.name: Verbose Performer
fields.description: The range of your bardic performances increases.
fields.prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Master Performer, bard level 8th, Kitharodian Academy 15 TPA.

fields.name: Whispered Knowledge
fields.description: You possess secret knowledge that enhances and helps perfect your undead form.

fields.name: Blood Of Heroes
fields.description: You have a sense of destiny about you and always seem to succeed, even when the odds are against you.

fields.name: Hero's Fortune
fields.description: Even at the start of your career, it was clear that you had a chance at greatness, and your legend continues to grow with every adventure.

fields.name: Luck Of Heroes
fields.description: To others, it seems that you always have a bit of luck around you.

fields.name: Celestial Obedience
fields.description: Your reverence for an empyreal lord is so great that daily prayer and minor sacrifices grant you special boons.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, must worship an empyreal lord.

fields.name: Accursed
fields.description: Your curse weighs down your soul like a millstone around your neck.
fields.prerequisites: You must carry a curse that can be lifted only by a quest or similar great undertaking, or have the Cursed Birth background.

fields.name: Arisen
fields.description: Escaping death strengthened your bond to life, but fills you with a need for answers.
fields.prerequisites: You must have been slain and brought back from the dead, or have the Left to Die or Cursed Birth background.

fields.name: Battlefield Healer
fields.description: In even the fiercest battles, you risk life and limb to save your allies.
fields.prerequisites: You must successfully cast a conjuration (healing) spell on an ally after being hit by an attack of opportunity, or have the Battle, Chaplain, or Healed background.

fields.name: Champion
fields.description: You must prove yourself through single combat.
fields.prerequisites: You must have defeated a single challenging foe without any aid from another, or have the Champion of a God, Champion of the People, Competition Champion, or Gladiator background.

fields.name: Damned
fields.description: From your earliest days, you were destined to sacrifice everything in your quest for power.
fields.prerequisites: You must have had friendly contact with an evil-aligned outsider that would qualify as a challenging foe, have a fiend-related sorcerous bloodline such as abyssal or infernal, have direct fiendish ancestry (such as being a tiefling or half-fiend), or have the Fiend Raised or The Fiend background.

fields.name: Deny The Reaper
fields.description: The lives you could not save stay with you to your final breath.
fields.prerequisites: You must have witnessed the death of a close companion in battle-a death that could have been prevented, such as from bleeding, failure to stabilize, or ongoing poison damage-or have the Death in the Family or The War background.

fields.name: Eldritch Researcher
fields.description: You seek new applications for magical energy.
fields.prerequisites: You must have created a new spell, or have The Way Things Work background.

fields.name: Fearless Zeal
fields.description: You're willing to lay down your life for your faith.
fields.prerequisites: You must be ordained as a sacred (or profane) champion of your faith by a high-ranking member of its clergy, or have the Devoted, Faith-Bringer, or Moral Debt background. Such an honor goes above and beyond the normal oaths required of a cleric or paladin.

fields.name: Feral Heart
fields.description: In your chest beasts the heart of a wild beast.
fields.prerequisites: You must have reverted to savage behavior through a traumatic event or extended period in the wilderness, or have the Raised by Beasts background.

fields.name: Foeslayer
fields.description: Your bitter feud with your enemies can be quenched only with blood.
fields.prerequisites: You must have been defeated and robbed of at least half your possessions by a particular group of humanoids or monstrous humanoids, or have the An Eye for an Eye, Hated Foe, Raiders, or Vengeance background. You may choose a specific race, such as duergar, or a broader group, such as goblinoids. At the GM's option, you may instead choose residents of a particular country, settlement, or tribe.

fields.name: Forgotten Past
fields.description: A pivotal event from your past eludes your memory.
fields.prerequisites: You must have suffered permanent memory loss or have the Reincarnated background.

fields.name: Glimpse Beyond
fields.description: You have glimpsed the madness at the edges of reality.
fields.prerequisites: You must have faced an undead, evil outsider, or aberration with a CR greater than your level +4, or have the Raised Among the Dead or The Dead One background.

fields.name: Innocent Blood
fields.description: With their deaths, the pitiful wretches that inhabit this world open your path to greatness.
fields.prerequisites: You must slay at least 50 intelligent noncombatants for either your own personal gain or for no cause at all, or have the Bloodthirsty, First Kill, or The Kill background.

fields.name: Liberator
fields.description: Your time in shackles has forever marked your soul.
fields.prerequisites: You must have been enslaved for at least 6 months, or have the Imprisoned or Kidnapped background.

fields.name: Lost Legacy
fields.description: What once belonged to your family shall be yours again.
fields.prerequisites: Your family must have claim to an inherited title or position that no longer belongs to them, or have the Dishonored Family background. You can take this feat even if you have no knowledge of this lost family title.

fields.name: Magnum Opus
fields.description: You seek to create a true masterpiece.
fields.prerequisites: You must either have sold five or more self-created works of art worth a total of at least 5,000 gp, have performed at least five performances for audiences of 50 or more while achieving a great performance result or better on your Perform check, or have the Virtuoso background.

fields.name: Monument Builder
fields.description: Your inspired architecture shall make your name immortal.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (engineering) 1 rank, and you must have built a structure worth at least 5,000 gp.

fields.name: Nation Builder
fields.description: The land calls to you to conquer it and forge a realm all your own.
fields.prerequisites: You must have explored and claimed an area of at least 100 square miles.

fields.name: Nemesis
fields.description: A past enemy seeks your ruin.
fields.prerequisites: You must have at least one enemy who wishes to cause you great harm. If you have multiple enemies, the GM may keep the specific nemesis secret, or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your nemesis is not already a challenging foe, it either advances in strength to become a challenging foe or allies with others to achieve a higher challenge rating.

fields.name: Prophet
fields.description: The truth has been revealed, and you have been chosen to deliver it.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast divine spells, and you must either have received a vision from your god (or another appropriate supernatural entity) or have the Marked by the Gods background.

fields.name: Redemption
fields.description: Your past failure haunts you and drives you on.
fields.prerequisites: You must have lost class features by violating the code of conduct of a class that possesses such a code, or have the Dishonored Family background.

fields.name: Shamed
fields.description: A past humiliation haunts you to this day.
fields.prerequisites: You must have been publicly embarrassed, or must have the Bastard Born background. If the embarrassment didn't cause significant harm to your personal honor or social standing, it does not qualify for the feat prerequisites. The humiliation doesn't need to have been unjustified.

fields.name: Stronghold
fields.description: You seek to build a bastion against which your enemies shall break like water against the rocks.
fields.prerequisites: You must have the Leadership feat and must lead at least 10 combat-capable followers (such as fighters or rangers).

fields.name: Thief Of Legend
fields.description: More than just a burglar, you aspire to commit crimes of legendary stature.
fields.prerequisites: You must have stolen at least 1,000 gp worth of treasure without being caught and kept mementos of these thefts worth at least 500 gp, or have the Greed background.

fields.name: Town Tamer
fields.description: This town needs cleaning up, and you're just the one to do it.
fields.prerequisites: You must have 5 ranks in Intimidate and a personal motivation to clean up a particular town (such as an old friend calling in a favor, or seeking a place to settle down), or you must have the Bounty Hunter or Champion of the People background.

fields.name: True Love
fields.description: You found love, only to have it denied by the cruelty of fate.
fields.prerequisites: You must have found love with a person you can't be with, have a current lover, or have the Current Lover, For Love, or The Lover background. Possible complications include distance, your love being with another, your feelings being unrequited, or your relationship being forbidden.

fields.name: Unforgotten
fields.description: You search for a person dear to you-lost, but you pray not dead.
fields.prerequisites: You must have a close relative, spouse, or other person dear to your heart who never returned from a journey, was captured, or otherwise vanished with little trace, or you have the Major Disaster background.

fields.name: Vengeance
fields.description: The need to avenge those you loved drives you to great deeds.
fields.prerequisites: You must have a close family member or other loved one slain by a specific challenging foe or that foe's minions, or have the Raiders or Vengeance background.

fields.name: Ancient Draconic
fields.description: You empower spells using the ancient language of dragons.

fields.name: Improved Learn Ranger Trap
fields.description: Your skill with traps is extensive.

fields.name: Kobold Confidence
fields.description: Your cunning, confidence, or faith in the draconic power in your blood allows you to overcome your physical frailty.

fields.name: Learn Ranger Trap
fields.description: You learn how to create one kind of ranger trap.

fields.name: Merciless Magic
fields.description: Your spellcasting is strongest against those in peril.

fields.name: Merciless Precision
fields.description: You delight and excel in bringing down hobbled targets.

fields.name: Mixed Scales
fields.description: You have two colors of scales, which mark you as special.
fields.prerequisites: Draconic AspectARG or dragon-scaled racial traitARG, kobold.

fields.name: Redeemed Kobold
fields.description: The purity you have found in the teachings of good dragonkind colors your scales and grants you confidence.

fields.name: Scaled Disciple
fields.description: Your draconic heritage manifests as divine power.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to spontaneously cast divine spells, kobold.

fields.name: Small But Deadly
fields.description: You have learned to make the most of certain weapons, despite your physical weakness.
fields.prerequisites: Weapon Focus or natural weapon, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Kobold Flood
fields.description: You are an expert at keeping creatures on the ground.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Kobold Groundling, Kobold Style, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Kobold Groundling
fields.description: Your small size grants you superiority over grounded foes.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Kobold Style, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Kobold Style
fields.description: You're able to manipulate foes that are caught off guard.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Small size or smaller.

fields.name: Tribe Mentality
fields.description: You and your tribemates grant each other mental strength.

fields.name: Wall Offlesh
fields.description: You swarm with your allies, becoming a wall of creatures.

fields.name: Apotheosis
fields.description: You are marked by fate as a future deity-even before this destiny is realized, fate bends to your will.
fields.prerequisites: You must have had direct contact with a deity or godlike being, or have been risen from the dead at the personal behest of a deity or godlike being.

fields.name: Artifact Hunter
fields.description: You seek an artifact-either a specific one or merely any item of legendary prowess-with dogged tenacity.
fields.prerequisites: You must have come within sight of a legendary artifact at some point in your past.

fields.name: Blessed
fields.description: The repeated notice and boons of celestials have marked you as one of their chosen agents.
fields.prerequisites: You must have had friendly contact with a good outsider that would qualify as a challenging foe, be a sorcerer with the celestial bloodline, or have direct celestial ancestry (such as by being an aasimar).

fields.name: Damned
fields.description: From your earliest days, you were destined to sacrifice everything in your quest for power.
fields.prerequisites: You must have had friendly contact with an evil-aligned outsider that would qualify as a challenging foe, have a fiend-related sorcerous bloodline such as abyssal or infernal, have direct fiendish ancestry (such as being a tief ling or half-fiend), or have the Fiend Raised or The Fiend background (see Ultimate Campaign).

fields.name: Dynasty Founder
fields.description: You will claim rulership of a city, whether under a larger government or independently.
fields.prerequisites: You must have lived in the chosen city for at least 1 year or be the heir of a former city leader.

fields.name: Explorer
fields.description: You dream of discovering new vistas.
fields.prerequisites: You must have crossed at least 30 miles of wilderness without map or guide.

fields.name: Foeslayer
fields.description: Your feud with your enemies can be quenched only with blood.
fields.prerequisites: You must have been defeated and robbed of at least half your possessions by a particular group of humanoids or monstrous humanoids, or have the An Eye for an Eye, Hated Foe, Raiders, or Vengeance background (see Ultimate Campaign). You may choose a specific race, such as duergar, or a broader group, such as goblinoids. At the GM's discretion, you may instead choose residents of a particular country, settlement, or tribe.

fields.name: Liberator
fields.description: Your time in shackles has forever marked your soul.
fields.prerequisites: You must have been enslaved for at least 6 months, or have the Imprisoned or Kidnapped background (see Ultimate Campaign).

fields.name: Planar Traveler
fields.description: The confines of the Material Plane cannot sate your wanderlust, and you walk between alternate spheres of reality unhindered.
fields.prerequisites: You must be related to an outsider or have been born on a plane other than the Material Plane.

fields.name: Prophet
fields.description: The truth has been revealed, and you have been chosen to deliver it.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to cast divine spells, and you must either have received a vision from your god (or another appropriate supernatural entity) or have the Marked by the Gods background (see Ultimate Campaign).

fields.name: Truth-Seeker
fields.description: A tantalizing secret from the past calls to you, and you intend to discover it.
fields.prerequisites: You must have visited a ruin or forgotten place that has been abandoned for at least five times as long as you've been alive.

fields.name: Object Of Legend
fields.description: The object of your quest drives you ever forward.
fields.prerequisites: You must have some highly personal stake in attaining the object of your quest as determined collectively by you and the GM-such as needing an ancestral weapon to exact your revenge against a known betrayer, seeking to destroy the artifact that caused your family's downfall generations ago, or attempting to behead a monster that ravaged your homeland during your youth.

fields.name: Center Of Power
fields.description: You have posted loyal followers in the most vital places.
fields.prerequisites: Leadership score 13, hold a leadership role related to running a kingdom.

fields.name: Expert Trainer
fields.description: You have a special knack for a certain profession and take to it with ease.

fields.name: Focused Overseer
fields.description: Your attention to detail provides you with insights into how to more effectively and economically gain certain commodities.

fields.name: Focused Worker
fields.description: Your attention to detail provides you with an excess of some commodities, at the cost of others.

fields.name: Fortunate Ruler
fields.description: Your good luck shines on your people, even in the most trying times.
fields.prerequisites: Hold the Ruler leadership role for a kingdom.

fields.name: Fortunate Manager
fields.description: Your good luck helps you and your business persevere even during the most troublesome times.

fields.name: Inspirational Commander
fields.description: Armies under your command enjoy higher morale thanks to your excellent leadership.

fields.name: Natural Ruler
fields.description: You have a special talent for ruling a nation, and take to the task with ease.
fields.prerequisites: Hold a leadership role related to running a kingdom.

fields.name: Precocious Youth
fields.description: Even in youth, you seek to be more adult than your childish peers, a personal trait that will no doubt aid you in future years.

fields.name: Dog-Sniff-Hate
fields.description: Unlike many goblins, you're not particularly afraid of dogs. You know what dogs smell like, and that smell makes you mad. Very mad.

fields.name: Dragoncrafting
fields.description: You have the ability to create rare and valuable items from the bodies of fallen true dragons.

fields.name: Courage In Numbers
fields.description: Your allies give you courage when you face an enemy as one.

fields.name: Overwhelm
fields.description: You can overwhelm large foes with sheer numbers.

fields.name: Tandemevasion
fields.description: You and your allies help each other evade deadly attacks.

fields.name: Covering Shield
fields.description: You can use your shield to protect your most vulnerable parts from area effects.

fields.name: Death Frombelow
fields.description: You have been trained to fight flying creatures.

fields.name: Dragonheart
fields.description: Your familiarity with dragonkind makes you less susceptible to their abilities.

fields.name: Dragonslayer
fields.description: You have been trained to fight dragons.

fields.name: Flaying Critical
fields.description: Your critical hits weaken your opponents' defenses.

fields.name: Porcupine Defense
fields.description: You are a threat to opponents that try to overwhelm you.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Combat Reflexes, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Reach Defense
fields.description: You are prof icient at avoiding polearms and long-limbed creatures.

fields.name: Snoutgrip
fields.description: You can hold an opponent's mouth shut.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Combat Reflexes, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +12 or 10th-level monk.

fields.name: Wingclipper
fields.description: Your attacks can prevent winged opponents from flying.

fields.name: Improved Day Job
fields.description: You learned the importance of an honest day's work while training as an initiate of the Pathf inder Society.
fields.prerequisites: Ability to attempt Day Job checks (see the Guide to Pathfinder Society Organized Play).

fields.name: Patient Strike
fields.description: Your training under the Master of Swords has taught you that a well-timed strike is worth waiting for and that patience will serve you well in the long run.

fields.name: Steadfast Mind
fields.description: You can concentrate even in the direst circumstances, and know how to retain your magic even when it would otherwise be wasted.

fields.name: Quick Preparation
fields.description: Early on in your adventuring career, you learned (perhaps the hard way) how to prepare your spells even when put under extreme time constraints.

fields.name: Renown
fields.description: Word of your pre-Pathf inder accomplishments precedes you, and you know how to make the most of your previous reputation.

fields.name: Versatile Spontaneity
fields.description: You made a good name for yourself in the Pathf inder Society in part because you knew how to prepare for the challenges before you, even if your natural magical abilities lend themselves less to preparation and more to spontaneity.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13 or Wis 13 (see Special), ability to spontaneously cast 2nd-level spells.

fields.name: Collective Recollection
fields.description: You and your allies can quickly jog each other's memories to remember essential facts.

fields.name: Esoteric Advantage
fields.description: You're able to discern subtle and ineffable flaws in a creature's defenses.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (arcana, dungeoneering, local, nature, planes, or religion) 3 ranks.

fields.name: Uncanny Activation
fields.description: You can coax greater power out of magical devices.

fields.name: Emergency Attunement
fields.description: You can adapt your defenses to any situation.

fields.name: Planned Spontaneity
fields.description: You have a measure of flexibility when preparing spells.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (arcana) 9 ranks, ability to prepare and cast 4th-level spells.

fields.name: Tapestry Traveler
fields.description: Your many visits to the Hao Jin Tapestry demiplane have made you an expert in long-distance travel.

fields.name: Cut Your Losses
fields.description: You realize that sometimes it's a safer bet to simply get out of danger's way as fast as possible. You are able to summon a surge of adrenaline when you grab what is most dear to you and run.

fields.name: Improved Underhanded Teamwork
fields.description: You and your allies have trained together long enough to know how to exploit an opponent's disadvantage to make her predicament even worse.
fields.prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, Underhanded Teamwork, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Underhanded Teamwork
fields.description: You and your allies know how to use coordinated maneuvers to set up an enemy with an unfair disadvantage.

fields.name: Atheist Abjurations
fields.description: Your critical attitude toward the divine allows you to determine the best ways to remove divine inf luence.

fields.name: Divine Defiance
fields.description: You distrust, disrespect, or doubt the gods, which helps you fight off their power.

fields.name: Divine Denouncer
fields.description: You choose to resist rather than serve the gods.

fields.name: Focused Disbelief
fields.description: So certain is your disbelief in the authority of the gods that you can brush aside their spells without effort.

fields.name: Iconoclast
fields.description: You know how to turn a holy symbol into a weapon against her followers.
fields.prerequisites: Divine Defiance, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, Intimidate 3 ranks.

fields.name: Seeds Ofdoubt
fields.description: You have learned to plant the seeds of your own doubt in the minds of others by way of your hexes.

fields.name: Animal Ally
fields.description: Your respect for nature is so great that you can form a deep and lasting friendship with an animal.
fields.prerequisites: Nature Soul, character level 4th, must not have an animal companion or mount that advances as an animal companion.

fields.name: Druidic Decoder
fields.description: You have a natural understanding of the Druidic language.
fields.prerequisites: Linguistics 1 rank, cannot be a druid.

fields.name: Friend To Animals
fields.description: You show great respect for all living things, and they sense and return the gesture.

fields.name: Nature Soul
fields.description: You are innately in tune with nature and venerate the power and mystery of the natural world.

fields.name: Weather Eye
fields.description: Your constant attention to the natural order and your place in it has given you a keen sense for the ebb and flow of the seasons.

fields.name: Bend With The Wind
fields.description: Meditation allows you to regulate your body temperature, heart rate, and other attributes to resist the elements.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 15, Body Control, Endurance, Meditation Master.

fields.name: Body Control
fields.description: You can directly manipulate your autonomic functions.

fields.name: Body Mastery
fields.description: Meditation allows you to harden your body against physical attacks.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 19, Body Control, Meditation Master, character level 15th.

fields.name: Combat Meditation
fields.description: Quick momentary meditation allows you to gain insight in combat.

fields.name: Meditation Master
fields.description: When fully focused on your inner self, you can enter a deep meditative state that allows you a more perfect control over your mind and body.

fields.name: Meditative Concentration
fields.description: Meditation clears your mind, allowing you to concentrate on your spells as if not distracted.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 5th.

fields.name: Perfect Awareness
fields.description: You can set aside all irrelevant sensory information to understand your surroundings perfectly for a moment.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 17, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 9th.

fields.name: Perfect Center
fields.description: You can ignore almost any distraction.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 21, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 17th.

fields.name: Slow Time
fields.description: Meditation allows you to perceive time as if it were moving more slowly.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 15, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 7th.

fields.name: Demonic Nemesis
fields.description: You are well acquainted with the machinations of a particular demon lord. You're resistant to his tricks, and have no fear of his minions.

fields.name: Exorcist's Rebuttal
fields.description: You've experienced the suffocating grip of demonic possession. The event left you emotionally scarred, but it also tempered your mind against the prying magic of evil enchantments.

fields.name: Outer Planes Traveler
fields.description: You have seen the outer reaches of the multiverse, and have gleaned knowledge from these alien realms. You have a special affinity for one of these realms in particular, and carry some of that plane's power within you.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (planes) 11 ranks, ability to cast plane shift or gate as a spell or spell-like ability.

fields.name: Vengeful Banisher
fields.description: You've witnessed demons and their madness firsthand, likely in one of the lands detailed in this section, or perhaps some other demon-marked region such as the Worldwound or the Abyss. Since then, you've sworn to send these wretched fiends back to whence they came, and you've become an expert at rooting out their kind and their servants.
fields.prerequisites: You witnessed at least one family member or a close friend being killed by demons or demonic cultists, or you have the Hated Foe or An Eye for an Eye background (see Ultimate Campaign).

fields.name: Coordinated Distraction
fields.description: When working in tandem, you can make it difficult for foes to use their magical abilities.

fields.name: Punch Through
fields.description: You and your allies are adept at bypassing enemy defenses.

fields.name: Spell Chain
fields.description: You help your allies bypass your foes' magical defenses.

fields.name: Babau Rogue Talent
fields.description: Your instinct for combat is much like that of a rogue.

fields.name: Flensing Strike
fields.description: Your slashing sneak attacks tend to slice away swaths of skin and natural armor.
fields.prerequisites: Sneak attack +3d6, bleeding sneak attack rogue trick or bleed universal monster ability.

fields.name: Improved Stench
fields.description: Your foul odor is particularly strong and wide-reaching.

fields.name: Pungent Stench
fields.description: Your stench is overwhelmingly nauseating.
fields.prerequisites: Stench universal monster ability, Improved Stench, Great Fortitude

fields.name: Toxic Stench
fields.description: Your stench is poisonous.
fields.prerequisites: Stench universal monster ability, immunity to poison, Improved Stench, Toughness

fields.name: Demonic Possession
fields.description: You can possess creatures.

fields.name: Improved Possession
fields.description: Your ability to possess bodies is more powerful.
fields.prerequisites: Demonic Possession or shadow demon, Cha 25

fields.name: Penetrating Possession
fields.description: Your ability to possess foes can bypass magical protections.
fields.prerequisites: Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability, Cha 21

fields.name: Spirit Vision
fields.description: You retain your senses when seeking a possession target.
fields.prerequisites: Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability, Wis 15

fields.name: Improved Infuse Weapon
fields.description: When you infuse weapons, you may add an additional magical quality.

fields.name: Multiweapon Defense
fields.description: You sacrifice attacks to parry blows.

fields.name: Multiweapon Specialist
fields.description: You gain bonuses on damage when you wield identical one-handed weapons.

fields.name: Consume Undeath
fields.description: You gain the powers of undeath when you feed upon their kind.

fields.name: Improved Death-Stealing
fields.description: Your death-stealing gaze creates more powerful undead.

fields.name: Accursed Hex
fields.description: Your hexes flare with persistent potency.

fields.name: Acrobatic
fields.description: Your grace and fluidity are beyond compare.

fields.name: Alertness
fields.description: Your powers of perception surpass everyone's, whether used to observe your surroundings or the intentions of others.

fields.name: Alignment Channel
fields.description: The power of your faith harms all creatures that follow the alignment you abhor.

fields.name: Animal Affinity
fields.description: You have a greater affinity with wild animals, and can speak with them.

fields.name: Arcane Armor Training
fields.description: You've adapted your spellcasting to overcome limitations of wearing armor.

fields.name: Arcane Blast
fields.description: You can manipulate raw eldritch energies to do more than just deal damage.

fields.name: Arcane Shield
fields.description: You sculpt spells into a powerful, enduring arcane barriers.

fields.name: Arcane Strike
fields.description: Using your amazing arcane talents, you can deliver devastating blows infused with magical energy.

fields.name: Ascendant Spell
fields.description: You have learned how to emulate mythic spells using non-mythic forces.

fields.name: Aspect Of The Beast
fields.description: Your blood burns with savage fury, giving you bestial powers and abilities.

fields.name: Athletic
fields.description: You excel far beyond others at acts of physical prowess.

fields.name: Augment Summoning
fields.description: Your summoning spells bring not mere ordinary beasts, but instead mythic creatures.

fields.name: Bleeding Critical
fields.description: Your deadliest blows unleash rivers of blood.

fields.name: Blind-Fight
fields.description: No creature can avoid your preternatural senses.

fields.name: Catch Off-Guard
fields.description: In your hands, anything is a deadly weapon.

fields.name: Channel Smite
fields.description: Your weapon a conduit of divine energy.

fields.name: Charge Through
fields.description: You can plow through those who stand between you and the target of your charge.

fields.name: Cleave
fields.description: You can cleave any foe within your reach.

fields.name: Combat Expertise
fields.description: You can dart out of the way of attacks with skill and defiance.

fields.name: Combat Reflexes
fields.description: You strike viciously whenever your foe gives you an opening.

fields.name: Command Undead
fields.description: Your control of the undead is nearly absolute.

fields.name: Critical Focus
fields.description: Your blows unerringly find your target's vital spots.

fields.name: Critical Mastery
fields.description: Your critical hits are versatile and devastating.

fields.name: Dastardly Finish
fields.description: You strike downed, dazed, and staggered opponents with deadly efficiency.

fields.name: Dazzling Display
fields.description: You can quickly deter others with your martial mastery.

fields.name: Deadly Aim
fields.description: Your aim is truly devastating.

fields.name: Deadly Stroke
fields.description: You can kill with a single stroke.

fields.name: Death From Above
fields.description: When attacking from the air or higher ground, you bear down on your enemy to deadly effect.

fields.name: Deceitful
fields.description: Your power to mislead is beyond compare.

fields.name: Deepsight
fields.description: Your sharp eyes can penetrate deeper into the darkness, revealing more to you.

fields.name: Defensive Combat Training
fields.description: Your defensive capabilities in combat are unmatched.

fields.name: Deflect Arrows
fields.description: You deflect projectiles and ray spells with uncanny skill.

fields.name: Deft Hands
fields.description: Your hands are astonishingly nimble.

fields.name: Detect Expertise
fields.description: You can sense a creature's magical abilities with just a mere glance.

fields.name: Disruptive
fields.description: You're a master at disrupting nearby spellcasters.

fields.name: Distance Thrower
fields.description: There's virtually no limit to your powerful throwing arm.

fields.name: Divine Interference
fields.description: Your divine power thwarts enemies of your faith.

fields.name: Dodge
fields.description: When focused, you become nearly impossible to strike.

fields.name: Dreadful Carnage
fields.description: Your kills are truly frightening to behold.

fields.name: Drink Is Life
fields.description: Strong drink fuels the mythic fires within you.

fields.name: Dual Path
fields.description: You follow two mythic paths.

fields.name: Eagle Eyes
fields.description: You eyesight rivals that of the most far-seeing raptors.

fields.name: Eldritch Heritage
fields.description: The blood of your sorcerous ancestor mingles with your mythic power to great effect.

fields.name: Elemental Channel
fields.description: Your power over elemental beings is nearly absolute.

fields.name: Elemental Fist
fields.description: Your ability to channel elemental power through your unarmed attacks is ferociously potent.

fields.name: Elemental Focus
fields.description: Your elemental spells are potent and effective.

fields.name: Elven Accuracy
fields.description: Your elven eyesight cuts though concealment.

fields.name: Endurance
fields.description: Your endurance is truly beyond the pale.

fields.name: Eschew Materials
fields.description: You can cast even the most powerful spells without using material components.

fields.name: Extra Mythic Power
fields.description: You can store more mythic power than your tier would normally allow.

fields.name: Extra Path Ability
fields.description: You can call upon mythic powers beyond those already invested in you.

fields.name: Fabulous Figments
fields.description: Your illusions are astonishingly realistic.

fields.name: Far Shot
fields.description: You make long-ranged attacks with remarkable accuracy.

fields.name: Fast Empathy
fields.description: You can soothe the emotions of wild beasts with nearly supernatural quickness.

fields.name: Fire Music
fields.description: You masterfully weave the ancient melodies of fire into your spells.

fields.name: Fleet
fields.description: You're fantastically light on your feet.

fields.name: Furious Focus
fields.description: Your attacks create a rhythmic barrage that doesn't sacrifice precision for force.

fields.name: Gnome Trickster
fields.description: Thanks to your mythic power, the magic in your blood has grown more potent and diverse.

fields.name: Gorgon's Fist
fields.description: Your strikes debilitate and disorient your foes.

fields.name: Great Fortitude
fields.description: Your fortitude is unmatched.

fields.name: Guided Hand
fields.description: Attacks made with your deity's favored weapon are divinely inspired.

fields.name: Heroic Defiance
fields.description: You ignore harmful effects that would bring others down.

fields.name: Heroic Recovery
fields.description: You can shrug off the effects of harmful conditions after they've taken effect.

fields.name: Improved Bull Rush
fields.description: You push foes around with amazing ease.

fields.name: Improved Channel
fields.description: As a divine conduit for energy, you're unmatched.

fields.name: Improved Counterspell
fields.description: Your innate understanding of magical mechanics allows you to unravel spells with pure magical energy.

fields.name: Improved Critical
fields.description: Your critical strikes with your chosen weapon are deadlier than most.

fields.name: Improved Dirty Trick
fields.description: You're a paragon of down-and-dirty fighting.

fields.name: Improved Disarm
fields.description: You're expert at knocking your enemies' weapons away.

fields.name: Improved Drag
fields.description: You pull your enemies around the battlefield with great ease.

fields.name: Improved Familiar
fields.description: Your familiar gains some of your incredible resiliency and insight.

fields.name: Improved Grapple
fields.description: Your wrestling moves are difficult to counter.

fields.name: Improved Initiative
fields.description: You leap into the fray with speed and confidence.

fields.name: Improved Overrun
fields.description: You're an unstoppable force on the battlefield, able to run down lesser foes with ease.

fields.name: Improved Reposition
fields.description: You put your foes right where you want them.

fields.name: Improved Steal
fields.description: Your light fingers can lift even the most closely held item off an enemy.

fields.name: Improved Stonecunning
fields.description: If you listen close, you can hear the secrets of stone.

fields.name: Improved Sunder
fields.description: Your mighty smashing blows demolish objects.

fields.name: Improved Trip
fields.description: You're expert at knocking your foes down.

fields.name: Improved Unarmed Strike
fields.description: Your unarmed strikes are more powerful than others.

fields.name: Intimidating Prowess
fields.description: Your mythic stature makes others uneasy.

fields.name: Iron Will
fields.description: Your will is incorruptible.

fields.name: Knockout Artist
fields.description: Your knockout punches are truly mighty.

fields.name: Legendary Teamwork
fields.description: You and your allies fight with great coordination.

fields.name: Lightning Reflexes
fields.description: Your reflexes are superhuman.

fields.name: Lucky Halfling
fields.description: You share your mythic luck with those around you.

fields.name: Lucky Surge
fields.description: Your surges defy the odds.

fields.name: Lunge
fields.description: Your reaching strikes aid your defenses against those you hit.

fields.name: Magical Aptitude
fields.description: Your understanding of the principles and intricacies of magic goes far beyond your training.

fields.name: Manyshot
fields.description: You can fire a barrage of arrows at your target with very little effort.

fields.name: Marked For Glory
fields.description: You're destined for glory beyond the ken of ordinary adventurers and mere mortals.
fields.prerequisites: Great Fortitude, Iron Will, or Lightning Reflexes.

fields.name: Maximize Surge
fields.description: In times of dire need, you can burn your mythic power to ensure success.

fields.name: Medusa's Wrath
fields.description: Your barrage of unarmed attacks builds to a single, staggering strike.

fields.name: Missile Shield
fields.description: Your remarkable awareness allows you to deflect multiple ranged attacks and even ray spells.

fields.name: Mobility
fields.description: You have perfected your ability to weave through the battlefield, using your momentum to propel yourself far.

fields.name: Monastic Legacy
fields.description: Every new experience carries you another step further along your path to enlightenment.

fields.name: Mounted Archery
fields.description: Your skill as a rider allows you to take cover and shoot with amazing accuracy.

fields.name: Mounted Combat
fields.description: Your ability to maneuver a mount through the rigors of combat is nearly unparalleled.

fields.name: Mythic Companion
fields.description: Despite your non-mythic nature, you're a vital part of the greater mythic world.

fields.name: Mythic Crafter
fields.description: You can craft mythic magic items.

fields.name: Mythic Paragon
fields.description: Your mythic power is even more potent than that of most other mythic beings.

fields.name: Mythic Spell Lore
fields.description: You have learned how to unlock the power of your spells, combining them with your mythic power.

fields.name: Natural Spell
fields.description: You can speak and use some magic items when you use wild shape.

fields.name: Nimble Moves
fields.description: You dance across obstacles with ease, as though they weren't even there.

fields.name: Penetrating Strike
fields.description: You know just how to strike to bypass even the most heavily armored foe's defenses.

fields.name: Persuasive
fields.description: You're a master of persuasion, be it with soothing words or harsh barking commands.

fields.name: Pinpoint Targeting
fields.description: Your attacks can home in on your opponent's weak spot and ignore many defenses.

fields.name: Point-Blank Shot
fields.description: Your accuracy with ranged attacks is unmatched at point-blank range.

fields.name: Potent Surge
fields.description: Your surge is more potent.

fields.name: Power Attack
fields.description: Your attacks are truly devastating.

fields.name: Powerful Shape
fields.description: The forms you take in wild shape tower over their natural counterparts.

fields.name: Prophetic Visionary
fields.description: Your precognitive powers aid you further.

fields.name: Quick Draw
fields.description: You can retrieve any item quickly, not just weapons.

fields.name: Racial Heritage
fields.description: Your racial heritage mingles with your mythic power to become more pronounced.

fields.name: Rapid Reload
fields.description: You can reload any type of weapon with astounding speed.

fields.name: Rapid Shot
fields.description: You can fire many times each round with amazing precision.

fields.name: Rhetorical Flourish
fields.description: You're supremely skilled at using verbal misdirection and finesse to inf luence others.

fields.name: Ride-By Attack
fields.description: You can make multiple attacks as you ride past your enemies.

fields.name: Run
fields.description: You run with preternatural speed and endurance.

fields.name: Saving Shield
fields.description: Shielding a comrade from harm gives you a chance to strike back.

fields.name: Scorpion Style
fields.description: Your unarmed strikes can induce a near-crippling lethargy in your enemies.

fields.name: Selective Channeling
fields.description: When you exclude creatures from your channel, you empower those you do affect.

fields.name: Self-Sufficient
fields.description: Independence comes naturally to you, and you have mastered taking care of yourself.

fields.name: Shatter Defenses
fields.description: Your dazzling attacks leave your opponents flummoxed and bewildered, unable to attack you or to defend themselves effectively.

fields.name: Shield Focus
fields.description: You're a master of using your shield for protection.

fields.name: Shield Slam
fields.description: Your shield bash produces a powerful kick.

fields.name: Shot On The Run
fields.description: With ease, you can snap off two shots while dashing across the battlef ield.
fields.prerequisites: Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Skill Focus
fields.description: You mastery with this skill is unmatched, even in difficult situations.

fields.name: Snatch Arrows
fields.description: You can use the weapons you pluck from the air to immediately make melee attacks.

fields.name: Sociable
fields.description: Your easy nature flows from you without effort, putting others at ease.

fields.name: Spell Focus
fields.description: Your magical specialties are particularly effective.

fields.name: Spell Mastery
fields.description: You're so familiar with certain spells you can prepare them with the greatest of ease.

fields.name: Spell Penetration
fields.description: Your mythic power breaches your enemies' defenses.

fields.name: Spellbreaker
fields.description: You're a spellcaster's worst nightmare.

fields.name: Spirited Charge
fields.description: Your mounted charge knocks the wind and wits from those foolish enough to stand against you.

fields.name: Spontaneous Metafocus
fields.description: You apply metamagic to your spells with greater ease than do other spontaneous casters.

fields.name: Spring Attack
fields.description: You move across the battlefield in a blur of whirling blades.

fields.name: Stealthy
fields.description: Your grace and fluidity are beyond compare.

fields.name: Strike Back
fields.description: Your precise counterattacks degrade your foes' advantages in combat.

fields.name: Strong Comeback
fields.description: You never make the same mistake twice.

fields.name: Stunning Fist
fields.description: With greater potency and frequency, your fists stun those who stand against you.

fields.name: Throw Anything
fields.description: You're so skilled at throwing weapons that it hardly matters what you throw.

fields.name: Titan Strike
fields.description: Your fists can fell titanic foes.

fields.name: Toughness
fields.description: You have legendary resilience and durability.

fields.name: Trample
fields.description: Your rearing mount can stomp foes into the ground, barely breaking stride.

fields.name: Tripping Staff
fields.description: Your staff is valuable for attack and defensive balance.

fields.name: Two-Fisted Drinker
fields.description: You can pound down drinks with amazing verve.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Defense
fields.description: Your graceful flow between attack and defense makes you difficult to hit.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
fields.description: With deft strikes, you gain an advantage over your foes beyond mere damage.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Rend
fields.description: Your synchronized dual attacks are even more dangerous, and can leave lasting wounds.

fields.name: Undead Master
fields.description: Through your fearsome mythic nature, you have matchless power over the undead.

fields.name: Unseat
fields.description: You knock your opponents down from their mounts with frightening concussive force.

fields.name: Valiant Vault
fields.description: Your mount can make heroic leaps.
fields.prerequisites: Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, Ride 5 ranks.

fields.name: Vital Strike
fields.description: You can strike your foes with incredible force.

fields.name: Voice Of The Sibyl
fields.description: You overpower weaker and more vulnerable minds with your voice alone.

fields.name: Warrior Priest
fields.description: Your faith speeds you in battle and further strengthens your mind and confidence.

fields.name: Weapon Finesse
fields.description: You're an expert with weapons that rely on your agility.

fields.name: Weapon Focus
fields.description: You're a master of one type of weapon.

fields.name: Weapon Specialization
fields.description: The damage you deal with your chosen weapon is truly awesome to behold.

fields.name: Witch Knife
fields.description: Your witch knife is as much an extension of your body as it is an extension of your power.

fields.name: Demonologist
fields.description: You have immersed yourself deeply in studies of the nature of the Abyss and its inhabitants.

fields.name: Demon Grafter
fields.description: Your studies into demonic anatomy and physiology allow you to graft their immortal tissues onto mortal flesh.
fields.prerequisites: Demonologist, Heal 5 ranks, Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks, Spellcraft 5 ranks.

fields.name: Demonic Obedience
fields.description: You physically defile yourself, others, or holy objects in order to prove your blasphemous devotion to a demon lord and gain special boons.
fields.prerequisites: 3 ranks in Knowledge (planes), must worship a demon lord.

fields.name: Extra Feature
fields.description: You are an exceptional shapechanger.

fields.name: Fast Change
fields.description: You can change forms faster than most skinwalkers.

fields.name: Bat Shape
fields.description: Your powers of transformation have been honed to the point where you can wholly become a bat.

fields.name: Bloodmarked Flight
fields.description: Your attunement to your werebat ancestry has allowed you to master a crude form of flight.

fields.name: Dire Bat Shape
fields.description: You can become a dire bat.
fields.prerequisites: Cha 13, Bat Shape, base attack bonus +3, werebat-kin.

fields.name: Bear Hug
fields.description: You can crush your foes with your powerful arms.
fields.prerequisites: Str 17, Beartrap Bite, Weapon Focus (bite), base attack bonus +8.

fields.name: Beartrap Bite
fields.description: You can hold your foes even if you do not manage to grapple them.

fields.name: Ferocious Loyalty
fields.description: You have a powerful sense of responsibility for your allies.

fields.name: Swarm Scatter
fields.description: You have studied the habits of swarming rats for defensive tactics.

fields.name: Swarm Strike
fields.description: You and your allies have trained to overwhelm foes like a swarm of rodents.

fields.name: Motivating Display
fields.description: You can empower your allies through their fear of you.

fields.name: Surprising Combatant
fields.description: You can briefly trick your foes into discounting you as a combatant.

fields.name: Violent Display
fields.description: You never miss an opportunity to cow foes.
fields.prerequisites: Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Wolf Savage
fields.description: You can savage vulnerable foes so badly they become supernaturally disfigured.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 17, Improved Unarmed Strike, Wolf Style, Wolf Trip, Knowledge (nature) 9 ranks.

fields.name: Wolf Style
fields.description: You can channel the curse in your blood to hamper foes that turn their backs on you.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (nature) 3 ranks.

fields.name: Wolf Trip
fields.description: You have studied wolves' skill at bringing down prey.
fields.prerequisites: Wis 15, Improved Unarmed Strike, Wolf Style, Knowledge (nature) 6 ranks.

fields.name: Bloatmage Initiate
fields.description: Your introduction to the ways of the bloatmage allows you to use elaborate rituals and gruesome rites to increase the amount of blood and lymph in your body, expanding your reserves of magical energy.

fields.name: Multiweapon Fighting
fields.description: This multi-armed creature is skilled at making attacks with multiple weapons.

fields.name: Stable Spell
fields.description: You can cast spells in areas of primal magic with less chance of triggering a primal magic event.

fields.name: Shadow Gambit
fields.description: You can tap into the Plane of Shadow to momentarily lend reality to one of your illusion (figment) spells.

fields.name: Shadow Grasp
fields.description: Your darkness spells have substance and bind your foes.

fields.name: Tenebrous Spell
fields.description: You blend shadow into your spells, increasing their efficacy at the price of susceptibility to light.

fields.name: Umbral Spell
fields.description: Targets of your darkness spells radiate darkness.

fields.name: Inscribe Magical Tattoo
fields.description: You can craft magical tattoos.
fields.prerequisites: Craft (calligraphy, paintings, or tattoos) 5 ranks, caster level 5th.

fields.name: Extend The Bulwark
fields.description: You can bolster a trained ally's defenses by interposing your own armored body.

fields.name: Quillbreaker Defense
fields.description: You know how to put armor spikes to defensive use by thrusting them into the path of an oncoming attack just in time.

fields.name: Shield Snag
fields.description: You know how to navigate your shield around weapons and can use it to keep your balance.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Shield Bash, Shield Proficiency, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

fields.name: Equipment Trick
