fields.description: Choose one piece of equipment, such as boots, a cloak, rope, a shield, or a heavy blade scabbard. You understand how to use that item in combat.

fields.name: Blowout Shot Deed
fields.description: By using a specially prepared mix of reagents, you can create concussive blasts with your firearm.
fields.prerequisites: Craft (alchemy) 3 ranks, grit class feature or Amateur GunslingerUC feat.

fields.name: Whip-Shot Deed
fields.description: You can fire your weapon and strike with it at the same time.
fields.prerequisites: Grit class feature or Amateur GunslingerUC feat, pistol-whip deed.

fields.name: False Casting
fields.description: When using a magic item, you can trick onlookers into thinking you used spellcasting instead.
fields.prerequisites: Magical Aptitude, Bluff 1 rank, Sleight of Hand 1 rank.

fields.name: False Focus
fields.description: You can use a divine focus to cast arcane spells.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (religion) 1 rank, ability to cast arcane spells.

fields.name: Osirionology
fields.description: You have a broad interest in Osirion and are something of an authority in one specialized field.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (history) 1 rank, Knowledge (local) 1 rank, must be able to speak Osiriani and Ancient Osiriani.

fields.name: Out Of The Sun
fields.description: Your allies use the sun's glare to their advantage.

fields.name: Thuvian Grenadier
fields.description: Training with alchemically inclined allies helps you avoid friendly fire.

fields.name: Undermine
fields.description: You and your allies take advantage of shifting terrain to unbalance enemies.

fields.name: Horn Of The Criosphinx
fields.description: You end your charge in a devastating two-handed attack.
fields.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th.

fields.name: Wings Of The Androsphinx
fields.description: You can reshape the kinetic energy of foes' charges.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +1 or monk level 1st.

fields.name: Shield Master
fields.description: Your mastery of the shield allows you to fight with it without hindrance.
fields.prerequisites: Improved Shield Bash, Shield Proficiency, Shield Slam, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Betraying Blow
fields.description: When you break an alliance, you make sure it's broken for good.

fields.name: Solo Maneuvers
fields.description: You fight best when you're on your own.

fields.name: Dirty Trick Master
fields.description: You are adept at stifling your enemies and can expertly make a bad situation even worse.
fields.prerequisites: Greater Dirty Trick, Improved Dirty Trick, base attack bonus +11.

fields.name: Divert Harm
fields.description: You know how to throw your enemies into harm's way at the last second.
fields.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6, evasion class feature.

fields.name: Crisis Of Conscience
fields.description: Your internal struggle and contradictory actions have left you teetering on a knife's edge between good and evil. You must choose which path you will make your own.
fields.prerequisites: Lawful neutral, neutral, or chaotic neutral alignment. Your alignment must have shifted from either good or evil at least once since 1st level or the last time you completed this feat (see Special).

fields.name: Planar Hunter
fields.description: After careful study of otherworldly environments, you can quickly evaluate how an outsider reacts in its home surroundings. You can use your knowledge of the outsider's native environment to guide your attacks and overcome the outsider's natural resistances.
fields.prerequisites: Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks, favored terrain (any plane) class feature.

fields.name: Practiced Leadership
fields.description: When you and your cohort are both members of the same organization, you needn't shoulder the burden of leadership alone. By relying on the authority of your shared organization as well as your own leadership skills, your cohort demonstrates improved devotion and tactical acumen.
fields.prerequisites: Leadership, membership in the same organization as your cohort.

fields.name: Fabulist
fields.description: You enjoy telling tall tales and gain confidence when others believe them.
fields.prerequisites: Amateur GunslingerUC feat or grit class feature.

fields.name: Gun Twirling
fields.description: You can spin and juggle a small firearm, making it difficult to predict where you will shoot.
fields.prerequisites: Amateur GunslingerUC feat or grit class feature, Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus.

fields.name: Named Bullet
fields.description: You can craft ammunition intended to kill specific foes.
fields.prerequisites: Amateur GunslingerUC feat or grit class feature, GunsmithingUC, base attack bonus +5.
